T02D2293:158b-1: tsar+y'a ko sha g'i ta t'i py'a ni pri tti n'a ma /
T02D2293:158b-3: spyod pa'i glu'i mdzod kyi 'grel pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2293:158b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2293:158b-5: dpal ldan bla ma dam pa'i zhal gyi chu skyes ro myangs rab gsal brtse ba'i thugs mnga' ba //
T02D2293:158b-6: gnyis med blo ldan dpal ldan rdo rje'i dbang phyug dri med zhal mnga' dad pas phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2293:158b-7: dpal ldan l'u yi zhabs sogs grub pa rnams kyis gsungs shing ya mtshan spyod pa'i glu ya tshogs //
T02D2293:158b-8: lam mchog dri ma med pa'i tshig ni rtogs par bya phyir de yi 'grel pas gsal bar bya //
T02D2293:158b-9: lus ljon shing mchog yan lag rnam lnga la //
T02D2293:158b-10: g-yo ba'i sems la sgra gcan rab tu 'jug / brtan par mdzod cing bde chen yongs kyi tshad //
T02D2293:158b-11: l'u yis smras ba bla ma la zhus mkhyen //
T02D2293:158b-12: ma lus ting 'dzin rnams kyis ci zhig bya //
T02D2293:158b-13: bde ba rtsa nas bton na nges bar 'chi //
T02D2293:158b-14: spongs shig sdeb sbyor byed cing g-yo sgyu'i blo //
T02D2293:158b-15: stong nyid phyogs la zhags pas bcing gis kye //
T02D2293:158b-16: l'u yi bdag gi bsam gtan nyid kyis mthong //
T02D2293:158b-17: zla ba nyi ma gnyis phab steng du sdong //
T02D2293:158b-18: pa ta ha'i snye ma zhes bya ba'i glu'i gdangs so /
T02D2293:158b-20: // / lus ljon pa'i shing zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2293:158b-21: pa ni gang zhig dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs kyi
T02D2293:158b-22: chu skyes kyi sbrang gi thigs pa'i tshogs 'bab pas
T02D2293:158b-23: sems brlan zhing yang dag par tshim nas bden pa
T02D2293:158b-24: gnyis la rmongs shing 'khrul pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i
T02D2293:158b-25: dbus su bying ba skyabs med la sdug bsngal ba'i
T02D2293:158b-26: skye bo rnams yang dag par gdon par 'dod pa'i
T02D2293:158b-27: phyir // grub pa'i slob dpon l'u yi pa'i zhabs kyi smon pas bskul ba rnams gdon pa'i phyir /
T02D2293:158b-28: lus ljon shing mchog ni dgongs pa'i tshig gis rnam
T02D2293:158b-29: par dag pa'i chos nyid gzhi'i rang bzhin gyi snang
T02D2293:158b-30: ba la sbyor ba gsungs te /
T02D2293:158b-31: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams dang /
T02D2293:158b-32: dbang po drug po rnams dang /
T02D2293:159a-0: yul rnams la gzung 'dzin du 'dzin pas lo ma dang 'dra bar @159a * //
T02D2293:159a-1: nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir lus ljon shing mchog tu gzung ngo //
T02D2293:159a-2: ci ste sems dang ldan pa'i phyir ji ltar lus ljon pa'i shing mchog ce na /
T02D2293:159a-4: de bzhin du phyi'i bstan bcos byed pas kyang nye
T02D2293:159a-5: bar blta bar bya ba'i rgyan gzhan la sbyor ba
T02D2293:159a-6: rnams kyis cung zad dbye bar gnas pa de dang
T02D2293:159a-7: 'dra ba nyid la nya bar brjod do //
T02D2293:159a-8: ci'i phyir brtags na rang bzhin du snang ba'i skyon gyi dbang las g-yo bde yis so //
T02D2293:159a-9: tha mal pa'i sems 'dzag pa'i rang bzhin gyis sgra gcan te /
T02D2293:159a-10: de nyid kyi dus su nag po'i tshes gcig gi skabs su rab tu 'jug go //
T02D2293:159a-16: gang ba rnams tshes kyi rim pas kun rdzob byang
T02D2293:159a-17: chub kyi sems ri dags mtshan skam par 'gyur ro
T02D2293:159a-18: // 'di khyad par du slob dpon nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis mngon par gsungs te /
T02D2293:159a-19: ri bo mchog gi mgul phug tu //
T02D2293:159a-20: 'gro rnams ma lus kun chad gyur //
T02D2293:159a-21: dri med chu rgyun skams nas 'gro //
T02D2293:159a-22: dus kyi me ni rab tu 'jug / de bzhin du ra ti badzra gyis kyang /
T02D2293:159a-23: byang chub sems ni lhung gyur na //
T02D2293:159a-24: dngos grub kun gyi gter ni gang //
T02D2293:159a-25: phung po rnam shes brgyal ba la //
T02D2293:159a-27: de bzhin du sam pu ta 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las kyang /
T02D2293:159a-28: dpag med rnam rtog mun pas zil gnon pa'i //
T02D2293:159a-29: rlung gis g-yo ba'i glog bzhin g-yo ba can //
T02D2293:159a-30: 'dod chags la sogs bsrung dka' dri ma yi //
T02D2293:159a-31: sems nyid rdo rje can gyis 'khor bar gsungs //
T02D2293:159a-32: de'i phyir gang 'ga' zhig phyogs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba rnams yongs su smin pa /
T02D2293:159a-33: rim pa lnga pa'i thabs 'dzin pa la zhugs pa
T02D2293:159a-34: sngon du 'gro ba zung 'jug bcings pa'i ngo bo
T02D2293:159a-35: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i 'bras bu rtag tu
T02D2293:159a-36: tshol ba na de yang rdo rje lta bu'i ting
T02D2293:159a-37: nge 'dzin mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2293:159a-38: 'phags pa lha'i zhabs kyis gsungs te /
T02D2293:159a-39: rim pa lnga'i go rims med na rdzogs pa'i rim
T02D2293:159a-40: pa yang dag pa'i byang chub mngon sum du byed
T02D2293:159b-1: brtan par mdzod cig ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:159b-2: ni 'dis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis sdom pa
T02D2293:159b-3: la sogs pa'i rim pas go rims ji lta ba
T02D2293:159b-4: bzhin du dbang bskur ba'i mchog rnal 'byor pas dam
T02D2293:159b-5: tshig gi brda'i rdzas kyis bla ma dam pa mnyes
T02D2293:159b-6: par byas nas nam phyed na shes rab dang ye
T02D2293:159b-7: shes kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa ji lta ba
T02D2293:159b-9: de bzhin du bde ba chen po dga' ba bzhi pa nyid kun gyi tshad ma'o //
T02D2293:159b-10: l'u yis smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:159b-11: ni de la rdo rje dang chu skyes yang dag
T02D2293:159b-12: par sbyor bas mi 'dzag pa'i bde ba'i phyir dpal
T02D2293:159b-13: ldan bla ma la zhus na khyad par gyis dga'
T02D2293:159b-14: ba khyab par bya ba dang khyab par byed pa
T02D2293:159b-15: des chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2293:159b-16: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba bde ba chen po
T02D2293:159b-17: nyin dang mtshan du shes so //
T02D2293:159b-18: de bzhin du dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las kyang /
T02D2293:159b-19: rdo rje bla ma dang bral na //
T02D2293:159b-20: nyon mongs ma lus spangs pa dang //
T02D2293:159b-22: phyir mi ldog pa thob mi 'gyur //
T02D2293:159b-23: de bzhin du yang klu sgrub zhabs kyis kyang rdo rje'i bzlas pa las gsungs te /
T02D2293:159b-24: 'ga' zhig ri dbang rtse las rab tu lhung gyur na //
T02D2293:159b-25: ltung bar mi 'dod na yang de bzhin rnam par ltung //
T02D2293:159b-26: bla ma'i drin gyis phan pa'i man ngag thob gyur na //
T02D2293:159b-27: grol bar mi 'dod na yang de bzhin grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2293:159b-28: sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis bshad sbyar las kyang gsungs te /
T02D2293:159b-29: gang zhig 'khor ba'i 'khor lo mi sgrub na //
T02D2293:159b-30: bdag nyid ched du yid ni nyer sbyor zhing //
T02D2293:159b-31: de blo brtan pa dang bas zhugs gyur na //
T02D2293:159b-32: spros bral rang gi bdag po'i sa nyid do //
T02D2293:159b-33: de yang so so rang rig skye 'gyur te //
T02D2293:159b-34: bde ba rtog pa'i dra ba las grol byed //
T02D2293:159b-35: dus kun du ni bla ma dam pa yis //
T02D2293:159b-36: de yi zhabs zung spyi bos gus par 'dud //
T02D2293:159b-37: de bzhin du dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang /
T02D2293:159b-38: bsod nams nyid las bdag gis shes //
T02D2293:159b-39: bla ma'i rim pa nyer bstan phyir //
T02D2293:159b-40: rkang pa gzhan gyis 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyi
T02D2293:159b-41: ting nge 'dzin nye bar gsal zhing rjes su bsngags
T02D2293:160a-1: ma lus ting 'dzin zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:160a-2: ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mtha' med pa'i ting
T02D2293:160a-3: nge 'dzin rnams kyis tshul gyi dbye ba ni mi
T02D2293:160a-4: dge ba bcu yongs su spangs pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2293:160a-5: dbang po rnams 'gog pa'i phyir nges par gsungs so //
T02D2293:160a-6: ting nge 'dzin de rnams kyis 'dir bya ba cung zad kyang med de /
T02D2293:160a-7: 'dod chags chen po'i tshul la bde ba dang bral
T02D2293:160a-8: ba'i phyir dka' thub dang smyung gnas la sogs pa'i
T02D2293:160a-9: nges pas so // de'i phyir dpal gsang ba 'dus pa las /
T02D2293:160a-10: dka' spyad nges pa drag po yis //
T02D2293:160a-11: lus ni skams shing sdug bsngal te //
T02D2293:160a-12: sdug bsngal las ni sems g-yeng byed //
T02D2293:160a-13: rnam g-yeng las ni dngos grub gzhan //
T02D2293:160a-15: de bzhin du dgyes pa rdo rje las kyang /
T02D2293:160a-17: 'dod chags kyis ni rnam grol pa'i //
T02D2293:160a-18: bzlog pa'i bsgom pa 'di nyid ni //
T02D2293:160a-19: sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes //
T02D2293:160a-22: bde ba rtsa nas bton na bde ba chen po'i
T02D2293:160a-23: de nyid dang bral bas sangs rgyas pa'i mu stegs
T02D2293:160a-24: pa rnams ni sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong
T02D2293:160a-25: zhing skye ba dang yang 'chi bar byed de /
T02D2293:160a-26: de rnams de kho na nyid kyi skal ba dang mi ldan pas so //
T02D2293:160a-27: de bzhin du yang lung las /
T02D2293:160a-28: bskal pa bye ba brgya yis kyang //
T02D2293:160a-30: zhes pa'i tshig las 'dod chags chen po'i tshul gyi spyod pa'ang gsungs te /
T02D2293:160a-32: dka' thub sdug bsngal bsten mi bya //
T02D2293:160a-33: 'dod yon lnga ni spang mi bya //
T02D2293:160a-35: bde ba yis ni byang chub bsgrub //
T02D2293:160a-37: de bzhin du dpal sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:160a-38: gang zhig phra rab sems kyi myu gu la //
T02D2293:160a-39: gal te yul bcud dri med kyis ma brlan //
T02D2293:160a-40: nam mkha' khyab pa'i 'bras bu sbyin pa yi //
T02D2293:160a-41: dpag bsam ljon shing nyid ni ji ltar 'thob //
T02D2293:160a-42: chags pa chen po'i tshul gyis spyod pa'i don mi 'dzags pa mngon du gyur pa ni tshad ma'o //
T02D2293:160b-0: de rnams kyi log pa'i shes pas mngon par chags pa'i zhen pa 'gog pa'i @160b don ni //
T02D2293:160b-1: rkang pa gsum gsungs pa spongs shing ces pa la sogs pa ni sdeb sbyor drug dang /
T02D2293:160b-2: g-yo sgyu byed pa la sogs pa bcing pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2293:160b-3: stong nyid phyogs zhes pa ni bdag med pa'i chos
T02D2293:160b-4: ni zhags pa ste de la 'dir nye bar 'khyud
T02D2293:160b-7: kye'i thar pa'i dang tshul lo //
T02D2293:160b-8: de bzhin du yang lung las /
T02D2293:160b-9: de dang de rnams ri rtse yang dag mtho ba yi //
T02D2293:160b-10: 'jig tshogs lta ba'i ri bo rgya chen gnas pa rnams //
T02D2293:160b-11: bdag med rtogs pa'i rdo rjes bdag 'jig cing //
T02D2293:160b-12: lhan skyes sdug bsngal nyid kyang 'joms par byed //
T02D2293:160b-13: rkang pa bzhi pas ji lta ba bzhin du gyur
T02D2293:160b-14: pa'i chos kyi bdag chen po thong ba'i rkyen du
T02D2293:160b-15: gsungs te / smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2293:160b-16: pa ni dang po sgrub pa'i slob dpon l'u yi
T02D2293:160b-17: zhabs kyis 'di bzhin du gsungs te /
T02D2293:160b-18: bsam gtan dbang gis zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i
T02D2293:160b-19: slob dpon l'u yi pa'i zhabs kyis bdag gis ni
T02D2293:160b-20: / yid dang rnam shes yul dbang thim gyur te //
T02D2293:160b-21: dpal gyi bla ma'i bzhi ba'i man ngag thob //
T02D2293:160b-22: goms pas zung du 'jug pa'i ngo bo mthong //
T02D2293:160b-23: de bzhin du lung las kyang /
T02D2293:160b-24: lus ni yang dag bde bas rgyal//
T02D2293:160b-25: dbang po rnams ni gnyid log bzhin //
T02D2293:160b-26: yid kyang nang du thib pa bzhin //
T02D2293:160b-27: sems ni sems med gsal bar snang //
T02D2293:160b-28: zla ba zhes pa ni dkar po ri bod 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa a'a li'o //
T02D2293:160b-29: nyi ma ni 'od zer stong ldan rnam par dag pa k'a li'o //
T02D2293:160b-30: de gnyis gdan du byas te rang gi lha'i nga
T02D2293:160b-31: rgyal gyis steng du sdod pa ni mngon sum du
T02D2293:160b-32: byas pa'o // de bzhin du brtags pa gnyis pa las kyang /
T02D2293:160b-33: a'a li k'a li yang dag sbyor //
T02D2293:160b-34: rdo rje sems dpa'i gdan du bya //
T02D2293:160b-36: rus sbal 'jo zhing stegs bu gzung du med //
T02D2293:160b-37: bse yab ljon pa'i 'bras bu chu srin za ;
T02D2293:160b-38: ; sgo bdun khang bzhugs nyon cig rigs dan gyi //
T02D2293:160b-39: mdo pags khang logs nam phyed rkun mas khyer //
T02D2293:160b-40: sgyug mo gnyid song mna' ma gnyid med gyur //
T02D2293:160b-41: mdo phugs khang logs rkun khyer gang du tshol //
T02D2293:161a-0: nyin mo mna' ma bya rog mthong bas 'jig / mtshan @161a * //
T02D2293:161a-1: mor song na k'a ma r'u ru 'gro //
T02D2293:161a-3: bye ba'i nang na gcig snying 'jug srid dam //
T02D2293:161a-4: chen po zhes bya ba'i glu'i gdangs se //
T02D2293:161a-5: de nyid bde ba chen po'i rgyal po rang gi
T02D2293:161a-6: chang gi btung bas yid rab tu dga' nas kukku
T02D2293:161a-7: ri ba'i zhabs kyis dgongs pa'i skad kyis rab tu
T02D2293:161a-9: du li zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i du ni gnyid kyi rnam pa /
T02D2293:161a-10: li ni gang la thim par 'gyur te /
T02D2293:161a-11: bde ba chen po'i rnam pa padma /
T02D2293:161a-12: du li ni rus sbal te dgongs pa'i skad kyi brdas khong du chud par bya'o /
T02D2293:161a-13: las kyi phyag rgya dang rab tu sbyor ba las
T02D2293:161a-14: dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim pa'i sgo nas 'jo
T02D2293:161a-15: ba ste kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems de aa
T02D2293:161a-16: wa dh'u t'i'i lam gyis 'ong ba'o //
T02D2293:161a-17: stegs bu ni rdo rje nor bu las ltung na
T02D2293:161a-18: gzung du med pa ste byis pa'i rnal 'byor pas
T02D2293:161a-20: de bzhin du nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:161a-21: 'di ni gzung dka'i ri bo yis //
T02D2293:161a-22: mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dzin par byed //
T02D2293:161a-23: k'hanas smras pa mtshon dka' dang //
T02D2293:161a-24: brjod dka' gang gi yid kyis bsgom //
T02D2293:161a-25: de'i phyir bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams kyis shes te //
T02D2293:161a-26: lus ljon shing gi 'bras bu'i de nyid byang chub
T02D2293:161a-27: kyi sems bse yab kyi 'bras bu bzhin du yod
T02D2293:161a-28: pa'o // chu srin zhes pa ni mtshan nyid dang
T02D2293:161a-29: bral bas yongs su sbyangs pa kum bha ka'i ting
T02D2293:161a-30: nge 'dzin gyis rang gis nyams su myong ba'i rim
T02D2293:161a-31: pas de za ba ni rang bzhin med par byed
T02D2293:161a-32: pa'o // pa'o // dhr'u'i rkang pas bstan par gsungs te /
T02D2293:161a-33: sgo mdun zhes pa ni 'byung ba'i rlung la nye
T02D2293:161a-34: bar ltos nas 'jug pa yang khong du chud par
T02D2293:161a-35: bya'o // rigs ngan zhes pa ni bdag nyid yongs
T02D2293:161a-36: su dag pa'i aa wa dh'u t'i'i tshul du grol
T02D2293:161a-37: ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis gsungs te /
T02D2293:161a-38: yongs su dag pa'i aa wa dh'u t'i pa gson dang /
T02D2293:161a-39: dang po rdo rje bzlas pa'i man ngag gis snang
T02D2293:161a-40: tshogs pa'i dga' ba aa wa dh'u t'i'i khang par
T02D2293:161b-0: de la khang pa ni slar yang nam phyed la bzhi pa'i mtshams @161b so ;
T02D2293:161b-1: ; mdo phugs khang logs zhes pa ni de nyid
T02D2293:161b-2: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rlung gi skyon gyi dngos
T02D2293:161b-3: po rnams lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rku bar
T02D2293:161b-4: byed do // rkang pa gnyis pas de nyid kyi don rgyas par bshad de /
T02D2293:161b-5: sgyug mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dang por myur ba'i dbugs te /
T02D2293:161b-6: zhi ba'i dga' ba'i rnal 'byor gyi gnyid du song
T02D2293:161b-7: ba aa wa dh'u t'ir dgongs pa'i skad kyis so
T02D2293:161b-8: // thog ma med pa'i srid pa'i rnam par rtog
T02D2293:161b-9: pa spangs te rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i
T02D2293:161b-10: aa wa dh'u t'i'i gzugs kyis rnal 'byor ma nyid
T02D2293:161b-11: kyang nyin dang mtshan du gnyid sang par byed de
T02D2293:161b-12: // / mdo phugs khang logs ni 'od gsal gyi
T02D2293:161b-13: rkun pos rab tu 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rlung
T02D2293:161b-14: gi skyon gang gi tshe khyer ba de'i tshe gzung
T02D2293:161b-15: ba la sogs pa'i dngos po med pas rnal 'byor
T02D2293:161b-16: gyi dbang phyug gis phyogs bcug gang du yang cung
T02D2293:161b-17: zad kyang btsal du med pa'o //
T02D2293:161b-18: rkang pa gsum pas yongs su dag pa aa wadh'u
T02D2293:161b-19: t'i'i dbye bas bden pa gnyis kyi rjes su bsngags
T02D2293:161b-20: pa gsungs te / nyin mo zhes bya ba la
T02D2293:161b-21: sogs pa ni chung du la sogs pa'i lhag pa'i
T02D2293:161b-22: bsam pa'i dbye bas de aa wa dh'u t'i pa
T02D2293:161b-23: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems kyi gzugs kyis 'jig
T02D2293:161b-24: rten gsum po sprul nas slar yang rang nyid nyin
T02D2293:161b-25: mo'i rnam par shes pa skyed par byed do //
T02D2293:161b-26: bya rog ces bya ba ni dus kyi skyes bus shin du 'jigs te skrag par byed do //
T02D2293:161b-27: de bzhin du lung las kyang /
T02D2293:161b-28: dper na ri mo mkhan gyis ni //
T02D2293:161b-29: gnod sbyin shin tu 'jigs byed gzugs //
T02D2293:161b-30: yang dag bris nas bdag nyid skrag / de bzhin mi mkhas 'khor ba pa //
T02D2293:161b-32: mtshan mo zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye shes
T02D2293:161b-33: kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i aa wa dh'u
T02D2293:161b-34: t'i pa'i phung po lnga la sogs pa la dbang
T02D2293:161b-36: k'a ma d'u zhes pa ni rang nyid bde ba
T02D2293:161b-37: chen po'i 'khor lo'i rang gi gnas su rnam par
T02D2293:161b-38: mi rtog pas 'gro bar byed do //
T02D2293:161b-39: de bzhin du lung las kyang /
T02D2293:161b-40: rang gnas gnas la lhan skyes kyi //
T02D2293:161b-41: rlung gis rtog pa'i dra ba grol //
T02D2293:161b-42: zhi ba'i gnas tshim gang gis kyang //
T02D2293:162a-2: de'i phyir bla mas gnang pa'i snying rje chen po'i
T02D2293:162a-3: thabs kyi rgyu mnos pas 'khor ba 'dir rab tu
T02D2293:162a-4: skyes shing rtag tu dga' bas sems can gyi don
T02D2293:162a-5: mdzad do // shin du rnyed par dka' ba rtogs
T02D2293:162a-6: par bya ba'i phyir rkang pa bzhi pa gsungs te
T02D2293:162a-7: mdzad do // / 'di 'dra'i zhes bya ba la
T02D2293:162a-8: sogs pa ni 'di 'dra ni 'di lta bu spros
T02D2293:162a-9: pa med pa spyod pa'i glu rnal 'byor gyi dbang
T02D2293:162a-10: phyug gis brtan par byed cing spyod pa la sogs
T02D2293:162a-11: pa can kukku ri pa'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa'i de
T02D2293:162a-12: nyid 'di'i don rnal 'byor bye ba rnams kyi nang
T02D2293:162a-13: nas gal te gcig gi snying gi nang du 'jug
T02D2293:162a-15: de bzhin du yang nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:162a-17: nga yis don dam shes so snyam //
T02D2293:162a-18: bye ba'i nang nas gal te gcig / mig sman med pa'i mi snang 'gyur //
T02D2293:162a-19: chen po zhes bya ba'i glu'i gdangs so //
T02D2293:162a-21: chang ma gcig nyid khyim ni gnyis na chang spyod byed //
T02D2293:162a-22: phabs dang rtsi med chu bdag chang ni sbyor bar byed //
T02D2293:162a-23: lhan cig skyes pa brtan par bzung kye rnal 'byor chang //
T02D2293:162a-24: gang gis rgas dang 'chi med phung po 'gyur med pa brtan //
T02D2293:162a-25: sgo ni bcu par rtags kyis mtshon pa mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2293:162a-26: chang nyo 'ongs pa rang gis chang ni khur nas 'ongs //
T02D2293:162a-27: chu tshod drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gha t'a'i stegs bu bshams //
T02D2293:162a-28: chang 'thung rab tu zhugs nas nges par byung ba med //
T02D2293:162a-29: chang gi bum pa gcig gi mchu ni shin tu phra //
T02D2293:162a-30: bi r'us smras pa brtan pa nyid du bskyod par gyis //
T02D2293:162a-31: yongs su dag pa dang yongs su ma dag pa'i
T02D2293:162a-32: dbye bas de la aa wa dh'u t'i pa bi
T02D2293:162a-33: r'u pa'i zhabs kyis mchog gi snying rje snying nas
T02D2293:162a-34: yang yid the tshom med par rab tu gsal bor
T02D2293:162a-35: gsungs te / chang ma gcig gis zhes bya ba
T02D2293:162a-36: la sogs pa ni gcig nyid drug gi sbyor ba
T02D2293:162a-37: las de aa wa dh'u t'i'i chang ma ni steng
T02D2293:162a-38: du sna'i dril bu'i bu ga la zla ba dang
T02D2293:162a-39: nyi ma g-yon dang g-yas pa dag rnal 'byor pa
T02D2293:162a-40: dar mas stobs dang ldan pas gnyis po sbyor bar
T02D2293:162a-41: byed par dbu mar rab tu 'jug par byed do
T02D2293:162b-0: gsungs te / // @162b des ni rang byin gyis brlab pa bstan par byed do //
T02D2293:162b-1: slar yang rang nyid de bzhin du 'ongs pa 'og
T02D2293:162b-2: tu sna ni rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mo'i bu
T02D2293:162b-3: gar byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le ni ma
T02D2293:162b-4: rig pa'i sa bon zhes sdang la sogs pa'i dri
T02D2293:162b-5: ma dang bral zhing 'od gsal bas bla ma'i man
T02D2293:162b-6: nang las dgongs pa'i skad chu bdag chang zhes te
T02D2293:162b-7: / bde bas rab tu tshim pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems 'ching bar byed do //
T02D2293:162b-8: brtan pa'i rkang pas don dam byang chub kyi sems brtan por byed pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:162b-9: lhan cig skyes pa zhes pa ni rdo rje bla
T02D2293:162b-10: ma'i drin las sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba la lhan
T02D2293:162b-11: cig skyes pa'i dga' ba brtan par bya'o //
T02D2293:162b-12: kye rnal 'byor pa chang zhes pa ni dgongs pa'i
T02D2293:162b-13: skad kyis de kho na nyid kun rdzob byang chub
T02D2293:162b-14: kyi sems su khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2293:162b-15: de'i byang chub kyi sems kyis rang bying yis brlabs
T02D2293:162b-16: par gyur pas mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i zhags pas
T02D2293:162b-17: bcing bar byas nas gang gis goms pa'i khyad par
T02D2293:162b-18: gyis rgas pa dang 'chi ba nyid med pa brtan
T02D2293:162b-19: pa'i phung po 'dis thob par byed do //
T02D2293:162b-20: de bzhin du rnal 'byor rin po che'i phreng ba las kyang /
T02D2293:162b-21: brtan pa'i snying po mi rnyings dang //
T02D2293:162b-22: mi chod mi 'jigs mtshan nyid do //
T02D2293:162b-23: mi 'tshig pa dang chud mi za //
T02D2293:162b-24: stong nyid rdo rje zhes brjod do //
T02D2293:162b-25: rkang pa gzhan gyis so sor rgyas par bshad pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:162b-26: sgo bcu ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2293:162b-27: rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgor yang chags pa chen
T02D2293:162b-28: po'i bde bas rab tu dga' pa'i rtags bltas nas
T02D2293:162b-29: dri za'i sems can nyid rang nyid 'ongs te sgo
T02D2293:162b-30: nas rab tu zhugs nas bde ba chen po'i chu
T02D2293:162b-31: skyes kyi ro'i btung bas rang gi sems tshim par
T02D2293:162b-32: byed do // de bzhin du nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:162b-33: ae wam yi ge'i sa bon len //
T02D2293:162b-34: chu skyes kyi ni me tog la //
T02D2293:162b-35: sbrang rtsi byed pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02D2293:162b-36: rab dga'i dpa' bo sprang rtsi snom //
T02D2293:162b-37: k'ahnas smras pa sems nyid ni //
T02D2293:162b-38: gang du mi 'jigs chad pa med //
T02D2293:162b-39: mi g-yo ba yi rlung nyid kyis //
T02D2293:162b-40: khyim mi mo yi khyim na 'khor //
T02D2293:162b-41: ji ltar rang nyid kyis ni sgom zhe na //
T02D2293:163a-1: dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang /
T02D2293:163a-2: rang nyid byed po rang nyid 'phrog / rang nyid rgyal po rang nyid gtso //
T02D2293:163a-4: rkang pa gsum pas dri za'i sems can gyi 'gro ba 'gag pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:163a-5: chu tshod drug cu rtsa bzhi zhes bya ba la
T02D2293:163a-6: sogs pa'i drug cu rtsa bzhi'i pad 'dab la gha
T02D2293:163a-7: t'i dgongs pa'i skad kyis sbrul pa'i 'khor lor stegs
T02D2293:163a-8: bu ni dgongs pa'i skad kyis de nyid kyang gdan
T02D2293:163a-9: no // de la chags pa chen po'i me 'bar
T02D2293:163a-10: ba las dri za'i sems can rab tu 'jug go
T02D2293:163a-11: no // // de'i 'jug pa ni 'byung ba med pa'o //
T02D2293:163a-12: de bzhin du nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:163a-14: bral zhing de la mi g-yor gnas //
T02D2293:163a-15: k'ahnas smras pa sems nyid ni //
T02D2293:163a-16: gang du mi 'gro chad pa me //
T02D2293:163a-17: mi g-yo ba yi rlung nyid kyis //
T02D2293:163a-18: khyim mi mo yi khyim na 'khor //
T02D2293:163a-19: rkang pa bzhi pa gsungs pa ni //
T02D2293:163a-20: bum pa gcig gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2293:163a-21: de nyid sngon du gsungs pa aa wa dh'u t'i
T02D2293:163a-22: pas kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis
T02D2293:163a-23: dbyer med par byed pa'i phyir gha t'i ste sna
T02D2293:163a-24: gnyis 'gog pa'i phyir shin du phra mo'i gzugs bi
T02D2293:163a-25: r'u pa'i zhabs kyis de bzhin nyid gsungs te /
T02D2293:163a-26: de yis khu ba'i rtsa bla ma'i man ngag las
T02D2293:163a-27: de la mi lhung ba byang chub kyi sems brtan
T02D2293:163a-28: par byas nas dba' rlabs med pa'i tshul gyis bskyod
T02D2293:163a-29: pa'o // de bzhin du dbang bshad pa las kyang /
T02D2293:163a-30: ji srid mi ltung 'od gsal rang bzhin te //
T02D2293:163a-31: bsil zer byed pa 'dzin pa'i khu ba nyid ;
T02D2293:163a-32: / lha mo'i padma'i 'dab ma'i nang nyid du //
T02D2293:163a-33: ro mnyam gyur pa rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02D2293:163a-34: rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor 'phro ba yis //
T02D2293:163a-35: 'jigs pa med pa'i snying rjes 'gro ba byed //
T02D2293:163a-36: de nyid dpal gyi snying rje'i stobs kyis ni //
T02D2293:163a-37: khyab bdag lhan cig skyes pa'i tshul nyid shes //
T02D2293:163a-38: skya rengs zhes bya ba'i glu'i gdangs gundi ri'i zhabs kyi'o //
T02D2293:163a-39: ka mgo non la yan lag 'khyud la byin //
T02D2293:163a-40: chu skyes rdo rje sbyor tshod dus min dgongs mo gyis //
T02D2293:163a-41: rnal 'byor khyod med skad cig kyang mi 'tsho //
T02D2293:163a-42: khyod zhal 'o byed chu skyes khu ba 'thung//
T02D2293:163b-0: @163b 'phangs nas len mi shes pa rnal 'byor ma //
T02D2293:163b-1: ma ni kunda li phyir ao dyan mnyam //
T02D2293:163b-2: sgyug mo'i khyim phyin lde kyog lde mig go //
T02D2293:163b-3: zla ba nyi ma gnyis kyi sgo glegs can //
T02D2293:163b-4: gunda r'i bdag kunda re pa smras //
T02D2293:163b-5: mi dang mi mo'i dbus su rtags mtshan btsugs //
T02D2293:163b-6: de nyid kyi don dpal he ru ka'i rtogs pa
T02D2293:163b-7: gunda ri'i zhabs kyis gzhan rnams la rang bzhin med
T02D2293:163b-8: pa rtogs par byed pa ni ka mgo zhes bya
T02D2293:163b-9: ba la sogs pa brkyang ma dang ro ma dang
T02D2293:163b-10: kun 'dar ma'i rtsa gsum mnan nas shin dugs la
T02D2293:163b-11: snang du byas pa de nyid yogs su dag pa'i
T02D2293:163b-12: aa wa dh'u t'i pa rnal 'byor ma bdag med
T02D2293:163b-13: ma'o // yan lag 'khyud la zhen pa ni aam
T02D2293:163b-14: ka ni rtags te sgrub pa po la ster bar
T02D2293:163b-15: ma'o // byed do // de yang skyod par byed pa'o //
T02D2293:163b-16: yang rnam pa sna tshogs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2293:163b-17: rnal 'byor pas dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim pa
T02D2293:163b-19: slar yang de nyid sgom pa pos rgyun mi 'chad
T02D2293:163b-20: par mngon par sbyor ba las dbu gas 'byin pa
T02D2293:163b-22: chu skyes rdo rje zhes pa ni kye'i mchog gi
T02D2293:163b-23: rnal 'byor pa yang dag par rdo rje dang chu
T02D2293:163b-24: skyes yang dag par sbyor ba la chags pas dga'
T02D2293:163b-25: ba la yang dag par 'jo ba de yis dus
T02D2293:163b-26: min pa zhes pa ni dus dang bral nas bdag
T02D2293:163b-27: la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub mngon sum du
T02D2293:163b-28: byed do // de'i phyir bde ba chen po gsal bar grags pa'i bdag ni dgongs pa'o //
T02D2293:163b-29: 'di bzhin du gsungs te kye'i bdag med rnal 'byor
T02D2293:163b-30: ma khyod med na skad cig kyang bsrung bar dka'
T02D2293:163b-31: ba'i shugs can rab tu g-yo ba'i phyir srog gi
T02D2293:163b-32: rlung bdag gis 'dzin par mi nus so zhes so
T02D2293:163b-33: // de bzhin du lung las kyang /
T02D2293:163b-34: skye dang gnas dang 'jig rnams la //
T02D2293:163b-35: bar do'i srid pa gnas pa ste //
T02D2293:163b-36: ji srid rnam rtog 'jig rten pa //
T02D2293:163b-37: rlung dang sems kyis rnam par byas //
T02D2293:163b-38: khyod zhal ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yang 'o byed pa'o //
T02D2293:163b-39: chu skyes khu ba zhes pa ni gtsug tor gyi
T02D2293:163b-40: padma'i chang don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bla
T02D2293:163b-41: ma'i drin las sna tshogs pa'i dga' ba skal ba
T02D2293:164a-0: dang ldan pa'i dus su byed @164a * //
T02D2293:164a-2: skal med dindi ma ru brjod //
T02D2293:164a-3: skal ldan k'a lim dza rar 'dod //
T02D2293:164a-5: rkang pa gzhan gyis rnal 'byor ma'i bsngags pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:164a-6: 'phangs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'phangs
T02D2293:164a-7: pa ni rang gi gnas su sbyor ba las de
T02D2293:164a-8: byang chub kyi sems kyi gzugs bdag med ma'i rnal
T02D2293:164a-9: 'byor ma mtshan nyid dang bral bas sbyangs pa'i dga'
T02D2293:164a-10: bas nor bu'i rtsa ba nas rmongs pa'i dri mas
T02D2293:164a-12: slar yang de la rtsa ba'i ro nyams su myong
T02D2293:164a-13: ba'i nor byu'i rtsa ba nas steng du 'gro zhing
T02D2293:164a-14: 'ongs pas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i bar du
T02D2293:164a-16: de'i phyir nag po spyod pa pa'i zhabs kyis gsungs te /
T02D2293:164a-17: de nyid ri bo mchog ces bdag gis smras //
T02D2293:164a-18: de nyid bde ba chen po nyid kyi gnas //
T02D2293:164a-19: ro gcig nyid gyur chang ni lhan cig skyes //
T02D2293:164a-20: ji srid bde ba chen po'i du ma bu long //
T02D2293:164a-21: rkang pa gsum pas gnas yongs su dag pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:164a-22: sgyug mo'i khyim zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2293:164a-23: dang por ji srid rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis
T02D2293:164a-24: lha nyid kyi rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas sku
T02D2293:164a-25: rdo rje brtan par byas nas rdo rje bzlas pa'i
T02D2293:164a-26: man ngag gis zla ba dang nyi ma dag gi
T02D2293:164a-27: phyogs su len pa 'gog pas gsung rdo rje brtan
T02D2293:164a-28: par byed do // thugs rdo rje brtan par byed
T02D2293:164a-29: pa'i phyir te sna tshogs pa dga' ba aa wa
T02D2293:164a-30: dh'u t'i pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba dang
T02D2293:164a-31: ro gcig pa'i ngo bos dbugs kyi khyim du ri
T02D2293:164a-32: rab kyi rtse mor len par byed do //
T02D2293:164a-33: lde kyog ces pa ni lde mig yang dag par
T02D2293:164a-34: sbyor bar byed pa nor bu'i rtsa ba'i sgor dgag
T02D2293:164a-35: par bya'o // bdag nyid yang dag pa'i byang chub
T02D2293:164a-36: rang nyid kyis mngon sum du song ba smra bar
T02D2293:164a-37: par bya'o // byed do // de bzhin du nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:164a-38: gang la yid rlung 'jug pa yin //
T02D2293:164a-39: sgo ni sbyor bas brtan par bya //
T02D2293:164a-40: gal te mi zad mun de la //
T02D2293:164a-41: nor bu'i sgron me sbar byas nas //
T02D2293:164a-42: rgyal ba'i rin chen steng gi ni //
T02D2293:164a-43: gal te nam mkha' phrad byas nas //
T02D2293:164a-46: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du
T02D2293:164b-0: grub pa'i slob @164b dpon g'unda r'i bdag nyid de
T02D2293:164b-1: lta bu'i bsngags pa gsungs pa ni smra zhes bya
T02D2293:164b-3: de rnams rab tu byin pa las gzhan kha phyir
T02D2293:164b-4: phyogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi
T02D2293:164b-5: nang du kun du ru yis dbang po gnyis snyoms
T02D2293:164b-6: par 'jug pa'i sbyor ba mi 'gyur ba'i bde bas
T02D2293:164b-7: nyon mongs pa'i dgra bcom pas bdag dpa' bo'o //
T02D2293:164b-8: slar yang de rnams kyis nang du rtags mtshan zhes
T02D2293:164b-9: pa ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi rtags dbang
T02D2293:164b-10: phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan brgyad dag gi mngon
T02D2293:164b-11: du gyur pa mngon par shes pas mthong ba'i don
T02D2293:164b-12: no // gu dzdza r'i zhes bya ba'i glu'i gdangs ts'a t'i la'i zhabs kyi'o //
T02D2293:164b-13: srid pa'i chu klung klong bcas zab mo rgyug cing 'bab //
T02D2293:164b-14: mtha' ma gnyis ni rab 'dred dbus na 'dug gnas med //
T02D2293:164b-15: chos dbyings don du ts'a t'i la yis zam pa byas //
T02D2293:164b-16: pha rol 'gro ba'i 'jig rten nges par sgrol bar byed //
T02D2293:164b-17: ma rig ljon shing gshags nas spang leb yang dag bsgrigs //
T02D2293:164b-18: gzong gnyis kyis ni brtan par mya nang 'das pa phug //
T02D2293:164b-19: zam pa de la 'gro na g-yas g-yon ma 'gro
T02D2293:164b-20: cig / nye bar bdog pas ring du 'gro bar
T02D2293:164b-21: ma byed cig / gal te khyed rnams 'jig rten
T02D2293:164b-23: bla med byang chub ts'a t'i la la dri bar gyis //
T02D2293:164b-24: de kho na nyid kyi don ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2293:164b-25: du gyur pa'i ts'a t'i la'i zhabs kyis sgra gzhan
T02D2293:164b-26: gyis rab tu gsal bar gsungs te /
T02D2293:164b-27: srid pa'i chu klung zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:164b-28: ni sngon du bshad pa'i brkyang ma dang ro ma'i
T02D2293:164b-29: rtsa'i snang ba rnams gsum tshu rol pha rol zab
T02D2293:164b-30: pa nyid kyis chu klung dgongs pa'i skad kyis khong
T02D2293:164b-32: nyin mo dang mtshan mod nag thun mtshams su yul
T02D2293:164b-33: la rnam g-yeng skyed pa nyams par byed pa yang
T02D2293:164b-34: ngo // de'i phyir klong dang bcas pa'i 'jigs su
T02D2293:164b-35: rung ba rang bzhin gyi skyon ni zab mo ste
T02D2293:164b-36: ngo // / lam drug gi sgo nas chu dang
T02D2293:164b-37: dri ma la sogs pa rab tu 'bab pa'i phyir
T02D2293:164b-38: ngo // / ro // de'i phyir na de bzhin
T02D2293:164b-39: du mtha' gnyis ni tshu rol dang pha rol te
T02D2293:164b-40: g-yon su shin tu 'dred pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2293:165a-0: rang bzhin gyi skyon gyi 'dam gyis ma gos pa dbu ma'i don la @165a * //
T02D2293:165a-2: aa wa dh'u t'i'i tshad ma'i rang bzhin gyis byis
T02D2293:165a-3: pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis byed par mi nus
T02D2293:165a-4: so // dh'u'i rkang pas bzhi pa'i dga' ba nye bar gsal bar gsungs te /
T02D2293:165a-5: chos kyi don ni rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i phyir chos te /
T02D2293:165a-6: bum pa dang snam bu nag ka ba dang rdzas
T02D2293:165a-7: la sogs par gyur pa ste rang bzhin gyis med
T02D2293:165a-9: dpal he ru ka'i rgyud kyi de kho na nyid
T02D2293:165a-10: kyi le'u gsungs pa rnam par dpyod pa dmigs pa
T02D2293:165a-11: med pa de yis grub pa'i slob dpon ts'a t'i
T02D2293:165a-12: li pas zam pa zhes gsungs pa ni kun rdzob
T02D2293:165a-13: dang don dam pa gcig tu byed pa bla ma'i
T02D2293:165a-14: drin gyis nye bar 'byed par byed do //
T02D2293:165a-15: de bzhin du sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:165a-16: stong nyid snying rje dag ni sbyor ba med gyur na //
T02D2293:165a-17: srid dang myang 'das mi gnas thob par mi nus so //
T02D2293:165a-18: gal te snying rje 'ba' zhig sgom par byed gyur kyang //
T02D2293:165a-19: skye ba stong gis thar pa thob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2293:165a-20: grub pa'i slob dpon gyi thabs 'dis thar pa rang gi lus kyis ni rnal 'byor pas so //
T02D2293:165a-21: de rnams kyang nges par rgya mtsho'i pa rol tu 'gro bar byed do zhes so //
T02D2293:165a-22: rkang pa gzhan gyis bshad pa'i don gsal bar byed pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:165a-23: gshags nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ma
T02D2293:165a-24: rig pa'i ljon shing ni yul la 'jug pa'i dbang
T02D2293:165a-25: las de la de bzhin du kun rdzob byang chub
T02D2293:165a-26: kyi sems kyi ljon shing bkas nas de'i yul du
T02D2293:165a-28: rtag tu 'od gsal ni yang spang leb ste lhan cig tu byed pa ni yang dag bsgrigs pa'o //
T02D2293:165a-29: slar yang 'di'i 'bras bur rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2293:165a-30: zung 'jug gi sta res brtan par byed pa'i phyir
T02D2293:165a-31: ro // rkang pa gsum pas lam gyi rjes su bsangs pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:165a-32: zam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rang
T02D2293:165a-33: byin gyis brlabs pa dang 'od gsal ba dag gcig
T02D2293:165a-34: tu byed pa ni zam pa ste skye bo sems
T02D2293:165a-35: pa rnams 'khor ba'i gya mtsho las pha rol tu
T02D2293:165a-37: kye rnal 'byor pa de la 'gro na g-yon dang
T02D2293:165a-38: g-yas su zla ba dang nyi mar snang ba dag
T02D2293:165b-0: sngon du rdo rje'i bzlas pas @165b 'gog pa las
T02D2293:165b-1: slar yang phyi nas sgom pas bsam par mi bya'o
T02D2293:165b-2: // 'dis goms pa'i dbang gis byang chub pa phyag
T02D2293:165b-3: rgya chen po'i dngos grub mi ring ba ste shin
T02D2293:165b-5: de'i phyir lam ngan pa la 'gro ba la de
T02D2293:165b-6: bzhin du ring du ma 'gro cig ces pa'i don
T02D2293:165b-7: no // rnal 'byor gyi gnas rkang pa bzhi pas gsungs te /
T02D2293:165b-8: gal te khyed rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:165b-9: ni sal snang gsum gyis rmongs pa chen po'i rtsa
T02D2293:165b-10: las pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams la
T02D2293:165b-11: kye rnal 'byor pa de'i tshe grub pa'i slob dpon
T02D2293:165b-12: gyi man ngag bdag gis nges par shes so zhes
T02D2293:165b-13: gsungs pa'o // gzhan rnal 'byor pas de bzhin nyid
T02D2293:165b-14: sgrub pa mi shes te po sti ba bltas pa'i
T02D2293:165b-16: de bzhin du nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:165b-17: do ha mdzod las mngon par gsungs te /
T02D2293:165b-18: lhan skyes gcig pa'i lam mchog de nyid ni//
T02D2293:165b-19: k'ahna pa yis gsal bar yongs su shes //
T02D2293:165b-20: lung dang bstan bcos mang po bklags pa dang //
T02D2293:165b-21: sbyangs kyang dbyings pas cung zad shes mi 'gyur //
T02D2293:165b-22: pa ta ha manydza ri zhes bya ba'i glu'i gdangs bhu su ku'i zhabs kyis so //
T02D2293:165b-23: gang gis zas la 'dus nas ci ste 'dug /
T02D2293:165b-24: mtha' skor rgol ba phyogs bzhi rnams so //
T02D2293:165b-25: ri dgas rang shar rang gi dgra ru langs //
T02D2293:165b-26: sor rtog skad cig mi 'dor bhu su ku //
T02D2293:165b-27: rtsva la mi reg ri dgas chu mi 'thung //
T02D2293:165b-28: kye ma ri dags pho mo gnas mi shes //
T02D2293:165b-29: ri dgas smra nyon rtsva med ri dags ma //
T02D2293:165b-30: nags 'di spangs nas 'jigs med gnas su song //
T02D2293:165b-31: mchod zhes rgyug pas ri dags rkang mi snang //
T02D2293:165b-32: bhu su kus smras blun snying la mi 'jug /
T02D2293:165b-33: de lta bu'i don gzhan gyi don du sems snying
T02D2293:165b-34: rjes bskul ba'i bhu su ku pa'i zhabs kyis ri
T02D2293:165b-35: dgas kyi sgras dgongs pa'i skad kyis gsungs so //
T02D2293:165b-36: gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thog
T02D2293:165b-37: ma med pa'i dus nas bzung nas shes bzhin ma
T02D2293:165b-38: yin pa'i skyon gyis 'chi bdag gi bdud kyi dug
T02D2293:165b-39: gis bskor nas 'dug pa sod sod ces rgol ba
T02D2293:165b-40: bdag gi sems kyi ri dags kyis thos nas /
T02D2293:166a-1: dam pa'i zhabs kyi rdul gyi stobs kyis kyis de
T02D2293:166a-2: rnam par spangs la chos thams cad dmigs su med
T02D2293:166a-3: pa de yis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo
T02D2293:166a-4: nyid du med pa'i phyir cis kyang bzung nas bdag
T02D2293:166a-6: dhr'u'i rkang pas brtan par byed do//
T02D2293:166a-7: rang gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de
T02D2293:166a-8: las de bzhin du rung gis byas pa'i ma rig
T02D2293:166a-9: pa dang ser sna'i skyon gyis g-yo ba de yis
T02D2293:166a-10: yang sems can de nyid ri dgas te /
T02D2293:166a-11: thams cad kyi dgra yis bskor bas sems kyi ri dgas skad cig nyid kyang spong ba'o //
T02D2293:166a-12: bhu su ku'i zhabs kyi sor rtog ni bla ma
T02D2293:166a-13: dam pa'i zhabs kyi mda' yis gzhan la 'phen pa'o
T02D2293:166a-14: // de lta bu nyid ces de bzhin du byang
T02D2293:166a-15: chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa las kyang
T02D2293:166a-16: // / ji srid pags pas btums pa 'di //
T02D2293:166a-17: rang gi blo yis gud du gyis //
T02D2293:166a-18: sha yang rus pa'i dra ba las //
T02D2293:166a-19: shes rab mtshon gyis dbye bar bya //
T02D2293:166a-20: rus pa'ang so sor dbye byas nas //
T02D2293:166a-21: rkang mar nang du bltas pa las //
T02D2293:166a-22: di la snying po ci zhig yod //
T02D2293:166a-23: rang nyid de bzhin rnam par dpyod //
T02D2293:166a-24: sems kyi ri dgas the tshom med par rtogs pa
T02D2293:166a-25: gang las bshad na rtsva mi za zhes bya ba
T02D2293:166a-27: dper na byi'i rig dags rtsva za zhing 'bab chu
T02D2293:166a-28: 'thung bar byed pa de bzhin du sems kyi re
T02D2293:166a-30: khyad par du rnam par dpyod pa'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D2293:166a-31: de dag sems dang rlung dag gi gnas ni 'dug
T02D2293:166a-32: gnas dbang po'i sgo yis mi rtogs so //
T02D2293:166a-33: de bzhin du nag po spyod pa pa'i zhabs kyis do ha mdzod las gsal por gsungs te /
T02D2293:166a-34: ri mchog rtse mo mthong ba yi //
T02D2293:166a-35: thang la sha ba ri dags bcas //
T02D2293:166a-36: gdong lnga pa yang mi mchong zhing //
T02D2293:166a-37: glang chen mchog ni ring du gnas //
T02D2293:166a-38: rkang pa gsum pas lus kyi nags yul la lo ma g-yo ba nye bar sdud pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:166a-39: ri dags zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yul
T02D2293:166a-40: gyi chu dang srid pa za bar ri dags te
T02D2293:166a-42: ri dags zhes pa ni dgongs pa'i skad kyis de
T02D2293:166a-43: nyid ye shes kyi phyag rgya bdag med ma sgom
T02D2293:166b-0: pa po goms pas dbang du @166b 'gugs shing dbugs
T02D2293:166b-2: kye'i sems kyi ri dags lus kyi nags 'di'i lus
T02D2293:166b-3: kyi khyim spangs nas gang la bde ba chen po'i
T02D2293:166b-4: padma'i tshal du song nas 'khrul pa'i rnam par rtog
T02D2293:166b-5: pa med pa la spyod do //
T02D2293:166b-6: de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i sdom pa las kyang ;
T02D2293:166b-7: dmigs med kun du khyab pa yis //
T02D2293:166b-8: yid ni snying rje ro gcig pas //
T02D2293:166b-10: cig car stong nyid 'khyud par gyis //
T02D2293:166b-11: rkang pa bzhi pas kyang chung du dang chen po la sogs pa'i rjes su bsngags pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:166b-12: mchong zhing rgyug pas ri dags zhes bya ba la
T02D2293:166b-13: sogs pa ni lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes khong
T02D2293:166b-14: du chud pa'i rnal 'byor pa de'i rang gi sems
T02D2293:166b-15: kyi ri dags kyi cha shas la sogs pa'i rnam
T02D2293:166b-16: par rtog pas mi rtog pa'o //
T02D2293:166b-17: 'ga' zhig gis kyang phyi'i bstan bcos dang lung gi
T02D2293:166b-18: mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi mkhas pa de rnams kyis
T02D2293:166b-19: kyang chos 'di la yang dag par rmongs shing shin
T02D2293:166b-20: tu ring du gyur pa ste /
T02D2293:166b-21: grub pa'i slob dpon bhu su ku pa'i zhabs kyis
T02D2293:166b-22: gsungs pa de rnams kyi snying la de kho na
T02D2293:166b-23: nyid du cung zad mig nye bar zhi ba tsam
T02D2293:166b-25: gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lha mo bzhis zhus pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
T02D2293:166b-26: thub chen chos kyi phung po ni //
T02D2293:166b-27: brgyad khri dang ni bzhi stong la //
T02D2293:166b-28: gang gis de nyid mi shes pa //
T02D2293:166b-29: de rnams thams cad 'bral med yin //
T02D2293:166b-30: rnga'i tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i glu'i dbyangs nag po spyod pa pa'i zhabs kyi'o //
T02D2293:166b-31: 'jigs byed dus mtshan ma yis la ma ni bkag / de mthong k'ahna sems ni rnam mi dga' //
T02D2293:166b-32: k'ahnas gang du phyin nas gnas 'cha' byed //
T02D2293:166b-33: yid kyi spyod yul gang de btang snyoms 'dug /
T02D2293:166b-34: khams gsum gsum pa gsum kyang so sor 'dug /
T02D2293:166b-35: k'ahnas smras pa srid pa yongs su gcod //
T02D2293:166b-36: gang dang gang byung de dang de yang song //
T02D2293:166b-37: bdag nyid 'ongs nas k'ahna yid mi bde //
T02D2293:166b-38: 'di ni k'na rgyal po'i pho brang nye //
T02D2293:166b-39: k'a hnas smras kyang bdag gi snying mi 'jug /'gro
T02D2293:166b-40: ba'i don la snying rje'i khur gyis thugs brlan pa'i
T02D2293:166b-41: slob dpon nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis de kho
T02D2293:166b-42: na nyid kyi don khyad par du 'phags pa gsungs
T02D2293:166b-43: te / 'jigs byed ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:166b-44: ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rang gi lha'i rnal 'bro
T02D2293:167a-1: bas rdo rje bzlas pa'i man ngag thob pa nag
T02D2293:167a-2: po spyod pa bas 'jigs byed ni ye shes kya
T02D2293:167a-3: snang ba dang dus mtshan ma ni snang ba mched
T02D2293:167a-4: pa gcig tu byas nas aa wa dh'u t'i'i lam
T02D2293:167a-6: slar yang bla ma dam pa'i drin las rang bzhin
T02D2293:167a-7: gyis yongs su dag pa aa wa dh'u t'i pa'i
T02D2293:167a-8: gzugs nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis yid khyad par
T02D2293:167a-10: k'a hna gang du phyin nas shes bya ba la
T02D2293:167a-11: sogs pa ni dhr'u'i rkang pas rang gis gnas su
T02D2293:167a-13: rang nyid de bzhin du bdag la sogs pa 'bod par byed de /
T02D2293:167a-14: kye nag po spyod pa rdo rje'i tshig khyab par
T02D2293:167a-15: bya ba dang khyab par byed pa'i gzugs kyis bde
T02D2293:167a-16: ba chen pos khyab pa ni 'gro ba zhes so
T02D2293:167a-17: // dpal ldan he ru ka'i rgyud kyi rgyal por
T02D2293:167a-18: gsungs pa'i don mngon du byed pa las gang du
T02D2293:167a-19: gnas 'cha' ba ni bdag nyid kyis gnas par byed
T02D2293:167a-20: // pa'o // thams cad de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i
T02D2293:167a-21: phyir gang rnams kyis kyang rnal 'byor pa'i yid kyi
T02D2293:167a-22: spyod yul yid kyi dbang pos rtogs pa nyid gtso
T02D2293:167a-23: // pa'o // bor gyur te / de rnams kyang
T02D2293:167a-24: 'dir chos la btang snyoms te de las ring du
T02D2293:167a-26: de bzhin du sar ha'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:167a-27: gang du yid rlung mi rgyu zhing //
T02D2293:167a-28: nyi ma zla ba 'jug med der ;
T02D2293:167a-29: / rmongs pa sems kyis ngal so gyis //
T02D2293:167a-30: sa ra ha yis man ngang bstan //
T02D2293:167a-31: rkang pa gnyis pas de la gsal bar byed pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:167a-32: gsum gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyi'i mtho ris dang sa stengs dang sa 'og dang /
T02D2293:167a-33: nang gi lus dang ngang dang yid dang /
T02D2293:167a-34: nyin mo dang mtshan mo dang thun mtshams rnams rnal
T02D2293:167a-35: 'byor ma'i rgyud la sogs par khong du chud par
T02D2293:167a-36: bya'o // de rnams phan tshun bde ba chen pos
T02D2293:167a-37: khyab par byed pa nyid kyis dbye ba'i mtshan nyid
T02D2293:167a-39: rnal 'byor pas don dam par rig pas so //
T02D2293:167a-40: de bzhin du lung las kyang /
T02D2293:167a-41: mtho ris sa steng sa 'og rnams /
T02D2293:167a-42: gcig gi gzugs gyur skad cig las //
T02D2293:167a-43: shes pa'i tshig las de rnams kyis don spyod pa glu dbyangs zhabs kyis gsungs te /
T02D2293:167a-44: sum cu bdun dang dgu dang sum cu brgyad //
T02D2293:167a-45: de rnams dkyil 'khor gsum la khyad par med //
T02D2293:167a-46: ces bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so //
T02D2293:167b-0: chos thams @167b cad khong du chud pa nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis /
T02D2293:167b-1: bdag ni srid pa'i rnam rtog gcod pa po //
T02D2293:167b-3: rkang pa gsum pas rang gi rjes su bsngags pa gsungs te //
T02D2293:167b-4: gang dang gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2293:167b-5: dngos po gang dang gang skyes pa de dang de'i
T02D2293:167b-6: dngos po thim par gyur pa'o//
T02D2293:167b-7: de rnams skyes ba dang 'jig pa rnams la kun
T02D2293:167b-8: rdzob kyi dben pa'i rang bzhin bla ma'i drin las
T02D2293:167b-9: yongs su shes pas nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyi
T02D2293:167b-10: yid khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su dag par
T02D2293:167b-11: gyur to // de bzhin du lung las kyang /
T02D2293:167b-12: srid pa'i de nyid yongs shos na //
T02D2293:167b-13: mya ngan 'das zhes bya bar brjod//
T02D2293:167b-14: rkang pa bzhi pas lam gyi rjes su bsngags pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:167b-15: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rang
T02D2293:167b-16: nyid kyi bdag la 'bod par byed de kye'i rdo
T02D2293:167b-17: rje nag po zhabs rim pa lnga sngon du song
T02D2293:167b-18: na slar yang rgyal po'i pho brang bde ba chen
T02D2293:167b-19: po'i grong khyer pa dag la shin du nye bar
T02D2293:167b-20: 'gyur ro // de bzhin du klu sgrub zhabs kyis kyang ;
T02D2293:167b-21: bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas snas //
T02D2293:167b-22: rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams kyi //
T02D2293:167b-23: de thams rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis kyang //
T02D2293:167b-24: skas kyi rim pa bzhin du sprul //
T02D2293:167b-25: lha rnams rol pa zhes bya ba'i glu dbyangs la ba'i na bza' can gyi zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:167b-26: snying rje'i gru ni gser gyis rab tu khengs //
T02D2293:167b-27: dngul la gzhag pa'i gnas nyid med par gyur //
T02D2293:167b-28: nam mkha' bltas nas la ba pa yis 'gro //
T02D2293:167b-29: skye ba song nas slar yang ji ltar 'byung //
T02D2293:167b-30: gru yi brtod phur thong la nyag thag thon //
T02D2293:167b-31: bla ma dam pa la dris pa yis 'gro //
T02D2293:167b-32: gru yi mjug la zhon pas mtshon zhing /
T02D2293:167b-34: gru skya med par mnyen pa gang gis 'gro //
T02D2293:167b-35: byang dang lho dag bcum nas gru sna zhon //
T02D2293:167b-36: bde ba chen po'i grogs dang lam du 'dzom //
T02D2293:167b-37: mchog gi snying rje'i dga' ba'i thugs tshim pa'i la
T02D2293:167b-38: ba'i na bza' can gyi zhabs kyi snying rje'i dgongs
T02D2293:167b-39: pa'i skad kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gsal
T02D2293:167b-41: gser zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snying rje'i
T02D2293:167b-42: zhes bya ba dgongs pa'i skad kyis de la de
T02D2293:167b-43: bzhin du byang chub kyi sems la gru zhes bya
T02D2293:167b-44: ste / gzugs kyi rgyan du gzhan la rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2293:167b-45: de dang de'i bdag nyid de yis rnam pa thams
T02D2293:167b-46: cad dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid dang lhan cig
T02D2293:168a-0: bla ma'i drin gyi bcud kyis gang nas bde @168a
T02D2293:168a-2: / rgya mtsho'i steng du 'gro ba ni bdag nyid
T02D2293:168a-3: la bdo pa ste grub pa'i slob dpon la ba'i
T02D2293:168a-4: na bza' can gyi zhabs kyis bsgrod par byed pa'o
T02D2293:168a-5: // rlu [?] pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:168a-6: ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du
T02D2293:168a-7: byed dang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnams
T02D2293:168a-8: kyi dbye ba'i gnas med pa ste /
T02D2293:168a-9: thams cad de bzhin nyid de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2293:168a-10: de rnams bzhi pa'i thab sa la grus 'gro ba ste /
T02D2293:168a-11: bdag grub pa'i slob dpon du gyur nas skye ba
T02D2293:168a-12: mtha' dag tu ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'i
T02D2293:168a-13: don no // de nyid bdag la bod pa ste
T02D2293:168a-14: la pa'i na bza' can gyi zhabs la rnam par
T02D2293:168a-15: mi rtog pa rab tu 'bab pa goms par gyis
T02D2293:168a-16: don no // shig pa'o // de bzhin du rab
T02D2293:168a-17: tu mi gnas pa gsal bar mdzad pa las kyang
T02D2293:168a-18: don no // shig pa'o // / ji srid 'ga'
T02D2293:168a-19: zhig rnam par rtog / rab skyes yid ni spang
T02D2293:168a-20: don no // shig pa'o // / bya ste / de srid du ni gnyis nyid phyir /
T02D2293:168a-21: gang yang dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D2293:168a-22: mchog tu bde bar byed pas so //
T02D2293:168a-23: de yang rnam par rtog pa tsam //
T02D2293:168a-24: gang yang chags pa dang bral ba'i //
T02D2293:168a-25: dngos med de yang de gnyis la //
T02D2293:168a-26: de yi dngos por 'dzin pa'i phyir //
T02D2293:168a-28: 'ga' zhig kyang ni yul nyid la //
T02D2293:168a-29: rnam par mi rtog bdag sems las //
T02D2293:168a-30: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa las //
T02D2293:168a-31: mi yi gru la brten nas ni ;
T02D2293:168a-32: / sdug bsngal chu bo tshe las sgrol //
T02D2293:168a-33: gru 'di phyis nas rnyed dka' bas //
T02D2293:168a-34: rmongs pa dus su gnyid ma log / rkang pa
T02D2293:168a-35: gzhan gyis de nyid kyi don gsal bar gsungs te
T02D2293:168a-36: / brtod hur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2293:168a-37: dang po la snang ba'i nyes pa la bla ma'i
T02D2293:168a-38: gsungs kyis brtan pa skyed par byed do //
T02D2293:168a-39: kye'i mchog gi rnal 'byor pa zhes so //
T02D2293:168a-40: nyag thag ni ma rig pa'i srad bu ma gyur
T02D2293:168a-41: du grol bar byas la de yis 'gro bar gyis
T02D2293:168a-42: shig pa'o // de rnams kyi snang ba'i khyad par
T02D2293:168a-43: gyis bla na med pa'i chos mngon sum du byed
T02D2293:168a-44: shig pa'o // par 'gyur te / 'dir tsho ma med do //
T02D2293:168a-45: rkang pa gsum pas bla ma'i gdams pa dang bral bas phyin ci log tu gyur par gsungs te /
T02D2293:168a-46: gru'i mjug ces bya ba la sogs pa ni dga'
T02D2293:168a-47: bral gyi lam du song nas phyogs bzher gzung ba
T02D2293:168b-0: dang 'dzin pa la @168b sogs pa'i rnam par rtog
T02D2293:168b-1: pa la gal te lta zhing rtog par byed na
T02D2293:168b-2: de'i tshe bla ma'i gsung ga mnyen pa dang bral
T02D2293:168b-3: bas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2293:168b-4: kyi sa rab tu bgrod pa bde pa chen po'i
T02D2293:168b-6: slar yang nges par 'khor bar ltung bar 'gyur te /
T02D2293:168b-7: de ltar yang nag po spyod pa'i glu dbyangs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:168b-8: dong du lhung na ga pur nyams par 'gyur //
T02D2293:168b-10: gang zhig slar yang bla ma dam pa'i gsung gis
T02D2293:168b-11: rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi bde ba'i rjes su
T02D2293:168b-12: tshol bar byed pa de 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha
T02D2293:168b-14: de bzhin du nag po spyod pa pa glu dbyangs zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:168b-15: gang zhig phug pas yid kyir ni po che //
T02D2293:168b-16: nyin re nyid re lhan cig skyes pa 'phro //
T02D2293:168b-17: de nyid kyis ni chos kyi gnas nyid shes //
T02D2293:168b-18: thub pa rnams kyis gzhan du ci zhig gsungs //
T02D2293:168b-19: rkang pa bzhi pas 'bras bu gsal bar byed pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:168b-20: byang dang lho zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2293:168b-21: g-yon dang g-yas kyis snang ba gnyis po dbus su
T02D2293:168b-22: rab tu zhugs pa'i phyir lam sna tshogs pa'i dga'
T02D2293:168b-23: bar gyur pa byang chub kyi sems la rang gi
T02D2293:168b-24: ye shes yongs su sbyangs nas bde ba chen po'i
T02D2293:168b-25: 'khor lo rgya mtshor mtshon nas de'i tshe 'dzom pa
T02D2293:168b-26: ste / de la lam du ni bde ba chen
T02D2293:168b-27: po'i grogs bdag med pa'i ye shes la mngon par
T02D2293:168b-28: 'khyud pa bdag nyid kyis thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2293:168b-29: pa da ha'i tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i glu dbyangs nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyi'o //
T02D2293:168b-30: ae wam yi ge brtan byas ka gnyis nyed //
T02D2293:168b-31: rnam pa sna tshogs khyab byed 'ching ba ston //
T02D2293:168b-32: k'ahna rtse zhing sbrang gi chang gis myos//
T02D2293:168b-33: lhan skyes chus skyes chal zhus sems med gyur //
T02D2293:168b-34: ji lta ji ltar glang chen glang mor chags //
T02D2293:168b-35: de lta de ltar de nyid ngos 'gram 'bab //
T02D2293:168b-36: 'gro drug mtha' dag rang bzhin dag pa ste //
T02D2293:168b-37: dngos dang dngos med la chags ma dag pa //
T02D2293:168b-38: stobs chu'i rin chen phyogs bcu rnams su 'phro //
T02D2293:168b-39: rig pa'i glang dbang nyon mongs nyid kyis btsal //
T02D2293:168b-40: dga' ba'i tshogs pas khyab pa de yis nag po
T02D2293:168b-41: glu dbyangs zhabs kyi sems kyi glang po che'i dgongs
T02D2293:168b-42: pa'i skad kyis de nyid kyi don gyi gzugs kyi
T02D2293:168b-44: ae wam yig zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bam
T02D2293:168b-45: yig zla ba'i snang ba ae yig nyi ma ste
T02D2293:169a-1: nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i shes rab ka ba gnyis mnyes nas snang ba med par byas te /
T02D2293:169a-2: rdo rje bzlas pas gzhan sna tshogs pa'i rab tu
T02D2293:169a-3: byed pa aa wa dh'u t'i khyab byed 'gog pa
T02D2293:169a-4: phyung nas gsum po de rnams kyi dmigs pa med
T02D2293:169a-5: pa'i chang gi btung bas rab tu myos pa'o //
T02D2293:169a-6: yod pa'i shes pa la glang po che'i dbang por spyod pa'i zhabs kyis gsungs so //
T02D2293:169a-7: chu skyes tshal ni bde ba chen po'i chu skyes
T02D2293:169a-8: kyi tshal du phyin na rnam par mi rtog par
T02D2293:169a-10: de bzhin du 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:169a-11: phyi rol gang de bden med rang bzhin bral //
T02D2293:169a-12: shes pa yang ni phyi rol don bzhin no //
T02D2293:169a-13: gang zhig stong par yongs su rtog byed na //
T02D2293:169a-14: de yang stong nyid 'dod pa 'ba' zhig min //
T02D2293:169a-15: de nyid yongs su rtog pa'i dngos tshogs ni //
T02D2293:169a-16: de nyid med la de nyid gcig pa'i blos //
T02D2293:169a-17: sgyur ma'i gang mkhan gar gyi bya ba la //
T02D2293:169a-18: gar mkhan rnal 'byor dbang phyug rtse bar byed ;
T02D2293:169a-19: / rkang pa gzhan gyi sa de nyid gsungs pa ste //
T02D2293:169a-20: ji lta ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:169a-21: ni ji ltar phyi rol du glang po che glang
T02D2293:169a-22: mo la chags pa'i myos pas rgyug par byed do
T02D2293:169a-23: // de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma
T02D2293:169a-24: la chags pa de yis sems ni glang po che'i
T02D2293:169a-25: dbang po nag po spyod pa pa'i zhabs kyi de
T02D2293:169a-26: bzhin nyid kyi chang rab tu 'bab par byed do
T02D2293:169a-27: // // de'i phyir rkang pa gsum pas dongs po dang dngos po med pa'i dmigs pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:169a-28: 'gro drug ces bya ba la sogs pa ni sgo nga la sa skyes pa dang /
T02D2293:169a-30: drod gsher las skyes pa dang /
T02D2293:169a-31: rdzu sa te skyes pa'i lha dang lha ma yin
T02D2293:169a-32: la sogs pa'i 'gro ba drug po rnams kyi rnal
T02D2293:169a-33: 'byor gyi dbang phyug dngos po thams cad ngo bo
T02D2293:169a-34: nyid kyis yongs su dag pa'i skra'i rtse mo tsam
T02D2293:169a-35: yang ma dag pa med pa'o //
T02D2293:169a-36: de bzhin du dbu ma'i bstan bcos las /
T02D2293:169a-37: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
T02D2293:169a-38: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
T02D2293:169a-39: yang dag nyid la yang dag ltar //
T02D2293:169a-40: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
T02D2293:169a-41: rkang pa bzhi pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
T02D2293:169a-42: stobs cu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni stobs
T02D2293:169a-43: bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan
T02D2293:169b-0: de bzhin nyid kyi rin po @169b che phyogs bcur
T02D2293:169b-1: khyab pa de yis nyams su myong ba goms pa'i
T02D2293:169b-2: stobs kyis 'phro ba dag nyid kyi'o //
T02D2293:169b-3: de'i phyir de bzhin nyid kyi rin po che'i mthus
T02D2293:169b-4: tha rig pa'i glang po che'i dbang po ma chags
T02D2293:169b-5: pa'i myos pa gang las so //
T02D2293:169b-6: de sha kha zhes bya ba'i glu dbyangs nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis so//
T02D2293:169b-7: grong khyer phyi rol g-yung mo khyod kyis khyim //
T02D2293:169b-8: reg gin reg gin 'gro de bram ze'i bu //
T02D2293:169b-9: kye'i g-yung mo khyod dang mnyam 'grogs bya //
T02D2293:169b-10: k'ahna thod pa'i rnal 'byor skyug bro spangs //
T02D2293:169b-11: gcig nyid pad 'dab drug cu rtsa bzhi la //
T02D2293:169b-12: der gnas g-yung mo gar byed pa pu l'i'i //
T02D2293:169b-13: bdag gis g-yung mo khyod la bden dngos dri //
T02D2293:169b-14: 'ong dang 'gro ba gang gi gru la byed //
T02D2293:169b-15: rgyud 'tshong g-yung mo gzhan yang me tog stegs //
T02D2293:169b-16: khyod kyi ched du 'dam bu'i bstan gzhag go //
T02D2293:169b-17: kye khyod g-yung mo bdag ni ka p'a li //
T02D2293:169b-18: khyod kyi ched du bdag gi rus phreng bcas //
T02D2293:169b-19: rdzing bu bcom nas g-yung mo bad rtsa zos //
T02D2293:169b-20: g-yung mo blangs nas bdag gi pha rol gsod //
T02D2293:169b-21: de kho na nyid kyi don bdag med pa'i chos
T02D2293:169b-22: khong du chud pa nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis
T02D2293:169b-23: g-yung mo'i sgras dgongs pa'i skad kyis gsungs te /
T02D2293:169b-24: grong khyer zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mi reg pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir te /
T02D2293:169b-25: g-yung mo ni yongs su dag pa'i aa wa dh'u t'i bdag med par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2293:169b-26: bram ze zhes pa ni bram ze h'um yig gi
T02D2293:169b-27: sa bon la skyes pa g-yo ba'i sbyor ba la
T02D2293:169b-29: man ngang thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas byang chub kyi
T02D2293:169b-30: sems kun rdzob khu ba'i gzugs nor bu'i rtsa ba
T02D2293:169b-31: las dga' bral la reg kyin reg kyin khyod 'gro
T02D2293:169b-32: ste kye bdag med ma'i 'grong khyer la zhes so
T02D2293:169b-33: // de phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i tshogs par shes par bya'o //
T02D2293:169b-34: dbang po'i spyod yul ma yin pa nyid kyis bla
T02D2293:169b-35: ma'i man ngang gis khyod kyi khyim ni bde ba
T02D2293:169b-36: chen po'i 'khor lo la bdag grub pa'i slob dpon
T02D2293:169b-37: nag po zhabs kyis rtogs pa zhes so //
T02D2293:169b-38: kye'i g-yung mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2293:169b-39: kye'i g-yung mo ni bdag med ma khyod dang bdag
T02D2293:169b-40: lhan cig mngon par 'khyud par bya'o //
T02D2293:169b-41: gang dang 'dra ba'i gnas de dang 'dra ba dag
T02D2293:169b-42: la bdag ni skyug bro ba dang ngo tsho ba
T02D2293:169b-43: la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'o//
T02D2293:170a-0: @170a * // de bas na bdag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
T02D2293:170a-1: 'dzin pas thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can
T02D2293:170a-2: phyag rgya chen pa'i dngos grub 'thob bo //
T02D2293:170a-3: ji ltar dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang /
T02D2293:170a-4: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud //
T02D2293:170a-5: de la bdag gis bshad kyis nyon //
T02D2293:170a-6: rkang pa gnyis pas goms pa'i gnas gsungs te /
T02D2293:170a-7: gcig nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni sprul
T02D2293:170a-8: pa'i 'khor lor padma 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi
T02D2293:170a-9: dang ldan pa la de la gnas pa'i bcom ldan
T02D2293:170a-10: 'das bdag med ma dang lhan cig ro gcig de
T02D2293:170a-11: yis chags pa chen po'i dga' bas shin tu yid
T02D2293:170a-12: du 'ong ba nyid kyis nag po spyod pa pa
T02D2293:170a-13: gar byed do // de bzhin du dpal dgyes pa'i
T02D2293:170a-14: rdo rje las kyang gar ni he ru ka gzugs
T02D2293:170a-15: gar byed do // kyis // rjes dran thob pa sbyor ba las //
T02D2293:170a-16: rkang pa gsum pas bdag med ma khong du chud pa brtan par byed do //
T02D2293:170a-17: kye'i khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa ni kye'i
T02D2293:170a-18: bdag med ma bden pa'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D2293:170a-19: bsam pas khyod la bdag gis dris pa'o //
T02D2293:170a-20: chos thams cad bdag med pa de'i gang gis kun
T02D2293:170a-21: rdzob byang chub kyi sems kyi gru'i lam gyis khyod
T02D2293:170a-22: kyis 'gro ba dang 'ong ba byed pa khyod yis
T02D2293:170a-23: mi byed do zhes pa'i don te /
T02D2293:170a-24: thams cad lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis zhes so //
T02D2293:170a-25: de bzhin du dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang /
T02D2293:170a-26: de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes //
T02D2293:170a-27: lhan cig skyes nga'i ngo bor brjod //
T02D2293:170a-28: ngo bo nyid ni mya ngan 'das //
T02D2293:170a-29: rnam dag rnam pa'i sems nyid do //
T02D2293:170a-30: rkang pa bzhi pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid du gsungs te /
T02D2293:170a-31: rgyud ces bya ba la sogs pa ni rgyud ces
T02D2293:170a-32: pa bha ga padma'i gnas su ma rig pa'i rang
T02D2293:170a-33: bzhin no // me tog steg ni de'i 'dab mar yul gyi snang ba'o //
T02D2293:170a-34: de dag bla ma'i zhabs kyi drin gyis bdag nyid
T02D2293:170a-35: 'tshong ba ni khyod kyis yungs su spong bar byos
T02D2293:170a-36: kye'i bdag med ma zhes so //
T02D2293:170a-37: de'i phyir gar mkhan bzhin du 'khor ba'i mdzod dag
T02D2293:170a-38: gis khyod kyi ched du yongs su spangs par bya'o
T02D2293:170a-39: zhes so // rkang pa lnga pas rnal 'byor gyi
T02D2293:170a-40: dbang phyug gi spyod par ba tu gsal bar gsungs
T02D2293:170a-41: zhes so // te / kye'i khyod ces bya ba
T02D2293:170a-42: la sogs pa ni kye'i g-yung mo bdag med ma'i
T02D2293:170a-43: rang bzhin de yis khyod la bzang pos bla ma
T02D2293:170b-0: dam @170b pa'i drin las bdag gis shes so //
T02D2293:170b-1: bdag kyang thod pa can gyis spyod pa 'dzin pa ste /
T02D2293:170b-2: kam ni khyod kyi bde ba /
T02D2293:170b-3: p'a ni skyong bar nus pa'o //
T02D2293:170b-4: de'i phyir khyod kyi ched du bdag nag po spyod
T02D2293:170b-5: pas de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi 'khor lo dang
T02D2293:170b-6: rna rgyan dang mgul rgyan dang rus rgyan gyi spyod
T02D2293:170b-7: pa bzung nas phyi rol gyi sngags dang rgyud la
T02D2293:170b-8: ltos pa med pa des rigs lnga'i spyod lam bya'o
T02D2293:170b-9: // de bzhin du nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:170b-10: gal te sangs rgyud cung zad cig med par //
T02D2293:170b-11: rang gi chung ma blangs nas rtse bar byed //
T02D2293:170b-12: rang khyim chung ma ji srid ma dag pa //
T02D2293:170b-13: de srid rigs lnga'i spyod lam gal te ci//
T02D2293:170b-14: rkang pa drug pas g-yung mo'i dbye ba rnam pa gnyis gsung te /
T02D2293:170b-15: rdzing bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bla ma'i drin gyis rnam par dman pa yis //
T02D2293:170b-16: de nyid g-yung mo aa wa dh'u t'i pa yongs su ma dag pa can no //
T02D2293:170b-17: rdzing bu ni lus kyi rdzing bu'o //
T02D2293:170b-18: de la rtsa ba de bzhin nyid byang chub kyi
T02D2293:170b-19: sems kun rdzob khu ba'i ngo bos gsod pa ste
T02D2293:170b-20: / bdag gis rang bzhin med par byed pa'o //
T02D2293:170b-21: de bzhin du phyir rol gyi bstan bcos las kyang /
T02D2293:170b-22: gang zhig sngags kyis byin brlabs chu //
T02D2293:170b-23: snod kyi khyad kyis bskur ba 'thob //
T02D2293:170b-24: sbrul gyi kha ru mid gyur na //
T02D2293:170b-25: nya phyis las skyugs mu tig gi //
T02D2293:170b-26: n'a d'i pa dang dombi pa'i zhabs kyis stong pa
T02D2293:170b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glu ni rnam par
T02D2293:170b-28: ma bshad do // pa da ha manydza ri zhes
T02D2293:170b-29: bya ba'i glu dbyangs nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyi'o
T02D2293:170b-30: ma bshad do // // n'a di nus ldan brtan gzung kha tv'i ga //
T02D2293:170b-31: gzhom med da ma ru sgrogs dpa' bo'i gdangs //
T02D2293:170b-32: k'a hna thod can rnal 'byor zhugs nas spyod //
T02D2293:170b-33: lus kyi grong khyer zhes byar rigs gcig spyod //
T02D2293:170b-34: a'a li k'a li dril bu rkang gdub can //
T02D2293:170b-35: zla ba nyi ma rna ba'i rgyun du byas //
T02D2293:170b-36: 'dod chags zhes sdang gti mug thal bas byugs //
T02D2293:170b-37: mchog gi thar thob mu tig do shal bcangs //
T02D2293:170b-38: sgyug mo aa ne skud po khyim du gsod //
T02D2293:170b-39: ma ni gsod pas k'a hna ka p'a li //
T02D2293:170b-40: mchog gi bde ba chen pos brjid pa'i nag po
T02D2293:170b-41: spyod pas slar yang de kho na bzhin du don
T02D2293:170b-42: dam pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gsungs
T02D2293:170b-43: te / n'a d'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:170b-44: ni rtsa sum cu so gnyis la de rnams kyi
T02D2293:170b-45: nang nas nus ldan gyi rtsa ni gtso bo aa
T02D2293:171a-1: t'ir khyad par gyi dga' ba'i ngo bo bla ma'i
T02D2293:171a-2: drin las nor bu'i rtsa bar rnam par gzung bar
T02D2293:171a-3: bya'o // kha tv'am zhes bya ba ni kha ni
T02D2293:171a-4: stong pa nyid 'od gsal bas lhan cig skyes pa
T02D2293:171a-5: la yang dag par reg pa'o //
T02D2293:171a-6: da ma ru'i sgra ni gzhom du med pa'i dbyangs
T02D2293:171a-7: dpa' bo'i gdangs kyi stong pa nyid seng ge'i sgra
T02D2293:171a-8: sgrogs par gyur pas nag po spyod pa pa ni
T02D2293:171a-10: lus kyi grong khyer du rab tu zhugs nas rab
T02D2293:171a-11: tu spyod pa ni nyon mongs pa mngon par za
T02D2293:171a-12: ba'i tshul gyis rigs gcig pa de yis spyod lam
T02D2293:171a-14: rkang pa gnyis pas rnal 'byor pa'i rgyan gsungs te /
T02D2293:171a-15: a'a li zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dang
T02D2293:171a-16: por re zhig rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis rdo
T02D2293:171a-17: rje'i bzlas pas yongs su sbyangs pa'i zla ba dang
T02D2293:171a-18: nyi ma la sogs pas dril bu dang rkang grub
T02D2293:171a-19: la sogs pa rnal 'byor pa'i rgyun du byed pa
T02D2293:171a-20: zhes so // rkang pa gsum pas rnal 'byor pa'i rgyan gsungs te //
T02D2293:171a-21: dod chags zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de
T02D2293:171a-22: rnams de bzhin du bde ba chen po'i 'dod chags
T02D2293:171a-23: kyi mes 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa
T02D2293:171a-25: thal ba de rnams kyis lus la rnams par dbyugs
T02D2293:171a-26: shing slar yang rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin gyis
T02D2293:171a-28: mchog gi thar pa'i mug tig gis brgyan nas 'chag pa'o zhes so //
T02D2293:171a-29: rkang pa bzhi pas thod pa can gyi spyod pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:171a-30: gsod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rlung ste /
T02D2293:171a-31: de la yid dang rlung dbang du byas te mig
T02D2293:171a-32: gi dbang po la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i
T02D2293:171a-33: rlung sna tshogs pa'i rab tu byed par khong du
T02D2293:171a-34: chud par bya'o // de la ma rig pa yang
T02D2293:171a-35: rang bzhin med par byas la sgyur ma'i tshul gyis
T02D2293:171a-36: thab dang shes rab dbyer med pa la nye bar

T02D2293:171b-25: dga' ba'i stobs de la de bzhin du byang chub
T02D2293:171b-26: kyi sems rdo rje bla ma'i man ngag las yang
T02D2293:171b-27: dag par rdo rje dang chu skyes mnyam du sbyor
T02D2293:171b-28: ba gnyis po gcig pa de yis rgyun mi 'chad
T02D2293:171b-29: par dga' ba mngon par sbyor bar rtse bar byed
T02D2293:171b-30: pa ni srid pa'i stobs yul snang ba'i stobs las

T02D2293:172a-0: gtsod par byed pa'o// zhes te / @172a * // pa zhes so //

T02D2293:172b-0: 'dod pa sbyin pa zhes @172b bya ba'i glu dbyangs nag po zhabs kyi'o //
T02D2293:172b-1: skyabs gsum grub byas gzhon nu ma rnams brgyad //

T02D2293:172b-7: dri reg ro ni ji lta de lta'o //
T02D2293:172b-8: gnyid ni med kyang rmi lam de bzhin no //
T02D2293:172b-9: sems kyis mnyen pas stong nyid grur 'jug la //
T02D2293:172b-10: zhon nas ka'hna bde ba chen po'i grogs //
T02D2293:172b-11: gsungs pa'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir glu gzhan gyis gsungs te /
T02D2293:172b-12: skyabs gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsum ni lus dang ngag dang yid do /
T02D2293:172b-13: yid de ni bzhi pa gang la thim par gyur pa'o //
T02D2293:172b-14: de la bde ba chen bo'i lus la gru'i dgongs pa'i skad du brtag par bya'o /
T02D2293:172b-15: de'i phyir stong pa dang snying rje dag gcig pa nyid ni rang lus te //
T02D2293:172b-16: zung du 'jug pa'i ngo bo de yis bde ba chen po'i lus kyis so //

T02D2293:172b-18: kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa'i bde ba nyams su

T02D2293:172b-20: sgrol zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thabs kyi

T02D2293:172b-27: rang bzhin zhes te 'dir ni rang gi tshor ba

T02D2293:172b-30: ji srid 'ga' zhig rnam par rtog / rab skyes yid ni spang bya ste /
T02D2293:172b-31: de srid du ni gnyis nyid phyir //

T02D2293:173a-24: gnyid sad pa'i gnas skabs su yang rmi lam bzhin du so sor gsal ba'o //

T02D2293:173a-39: bskyod cig dombi kye'i bskyod cig dombi'i lam ni drang po la //

T02D2293:173b-31: bde ba chen po'i grong khyer dang shin tu nye

T02D2293:174a-6: 'khor ba skyed pa dang sdud pa'i byed pa po'o //
T02D2293:174a-7: chos thams cad dmigs pa me dpa'i rgyam sol la

T02D2293:174a-15: rol du phan tshun du sgrol bar byed pa la
