T02D2293:174b-13: phyir mi ldog pa bde ba che po'i 'khor lo'i
T02D2293:174b-14: rdzing bu'i tshal du sbyor ba'o //
T02D2293:174b-15: de bzhin du ra ti badzra gyis kyang //
T02D2293:174b-16: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02D2293:174b-17: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02D2293:174b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2293:174b-21: brtan pa'i rkang pas de kho na nyid kyi don brtan par byed do /
T02D2293:174b-22: lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ku la
T02D2293:174b-23: ste rang gi lus la khye'i rmongs pa byis pa'i
T02D2293:174b-24: rnal 'byor pa 'dir khyad par gyi dga' ba'i thabs
T02D2293:174b-25: lam spangs nas lam gzhan gyi sdom pas mngon par
T02D2293:174b-27: de bzhin du ra ti badzra gyis kyang /
T02D2293:174b-28: thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas min //
T02D2293:174b-29: dag pa 'di ni 'gro ba'i bdag / ces so //
T02D2293:174b-30: de nas rdo rje'i lam g-yon dang g-yas su skra'i
T02D2293:174b-31: rtse mo tsam la sog pa'i rnam par rtog pa
T02D2293:174b-32: yang mi bya'o // kye'i byis pa'i rnal 'byor ba
T02D2293:174b-33: ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gser gyi
T02D2293:174b-34: lam bzung nas skyed mos tshal du rol rtsed la
T02D2293:174b-35: 'jug pa ltar 'dir yang rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
T02D2293:174b-36: kyang aa wa dh'u ti'i lam gyi rol rtsed kyi
T02D2293:174b-37: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i chu skyes kyi skyed
T02D2293:174b-38: mos tshal du 'jug par byed do //
T02D2293:174b-39: de bzhin du bi r'u pa'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:174b-40: nyi zlar 'gro ba gzhom pa'i phyir /
T02D2293:174b-41: rtag tu rdo rje bslang bar bya //
T02D2293:174b-42: gzhan du na ni kun spangs 'char //
T02D2293:174b-43: srog gi rlung ni 'jug pa med //
T02D2293:175a-0: byis pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i dbang du byas nas @175a * //
T02D2293:175a-1: rkang pa gnyis pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:175a-2: sgyu ma la rmongs rgya mtsho yi //
T02D2293:175a-3: zhes bya ba la sog pa'i sgyu ma ni shes rab tu brjod de //
T02D2293:175a-4: de la mngon par chags pa ni rmongs pa'i //
T02D2293:175a-5: den yid rgyam tsho chen po de'i mtha' tshad byis pa'i rnal 'byor pas mi shes so /
T02D2293:175a-6: de nas de la bla ma dam pa'i gsung gis
T02D2293:175a-7: gru rgyal rnam par spangs nas gzhan gyi gru'i thabs
T02D2293:175a-8: kyang med de / kye'i byis pa 'i rnal 'byor
T02D2293:175a-9: pa bla ma dam pa'i mgon la ci'i phyir 'khrul
T02D2293:175a-11: de'i 'khrul pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs nas dpal gyi
T02D2293:175a-12: bla ma 'i zhal las bzhi ba'i dga' ba'i thabs
T02D2293:175a-13: blangs nas de'i sgyu ma la rmongs pa rgya mtsho'i
T02D2293:175a-14: mtha' tshad ma'i ngo bo nyid du bya'o /
T02D2293:175a-15: de bzhin du bla na med pa'i mtshams sbyor las kyang /
T02D2293:175a-16: sgyu ma'i des pa thams cad las //
T02D2293:175a-17: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
T02D2293:175a-18: ye shes gsum gyi rab dbye 'di //
T02D2293:175a-19: 'di nyid la ni gsal bar mtshon //
T02D2293:175a-20: rkang pa gsum pas lam gyi che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs te /
T02D2293:175a-21: stong pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir
T02D2293:175a-22: yag lam thob nas 'od gsal stong pa nyid du
T02D2293:175a-23: bya ste chad par thal ba'i 'khrul par mi bya'o
T02D2293:175a-24: // kye'i rmongs pa 'dir de nyid 'od gsal bas
T02D2293:175a-25: yang sbyangs shing rang gis brlab pa'i sems la sgom
T02D2293:175a-26: pa pos slar yang dngos grub brgyad nges par thob
T02D2293:175a-27: // par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du lung las kyang //
T02D2293:175a-28: lhan skye ye she me yis ni /
T02D2293:175a-29: sgyu ma'i grong khyer rab dga' bsregs //
T02D2293:175a-30: rtag tu stong nyid mthong ba yis //
T02D2293:175a-31: rnal 'byor pa ni lha mig nyid //
T02D2293:175a-32: rkang pa bzhi pas de nyid rgyas par bshad par gsungs te /
T02D2293:175a-33: byang zhes bya ba la sog pa na grub pa'i
T02D2293:175a-34: slob dpon sh'anti pas lho byang gi snang ba gnyis
T02D2293:175a-35: yongs su sdud pa gsal por byas nas yul gyi
T02D2293:175a-36: dngos por nye bar sdud par byed do //
T02D2293:175a-37: 'dir yongs su dag pa'i aa wa dh'u t'ir khyad
T02D2293:175a-38: par gyi dga' ba'i lam gyis 'gro bar gyur pa
T02D2293:175a-39: la 'ga' dang khral sa dang sho gam dang 'phrang
T02D2293:175b-0: rtsa dang tsher ma dngos la @175b sogs pa'i bar chad med pa'o //
T02D2293:175b-1: de nas mig zim bu mi g-yo ba'i mig zung gis yang dag par mthong ste /
T02D2293:175b-2: de bzhin du lung las kyang /
T02D2293:175b-3: mig ni g-yo ba med byas te //
T02D2293:175b-4: mgo ni cung zad smang byas nas /
T02D2293:175b-5: sems nyi brlan pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D2293:175b-6: stong nyid stong par mig gis mthong //
T02D2293:175b-7: rnga bo cha zhes bya ba'i glu dbyangs sa 'dzin zhabs kyi'o //
T02D2293:175b-8: rnam gsum sbyor zhing gzhom med sgra ni rab 'jigs glang chen sgrogs //
T02D2293:175b-9: de thos bdud rnams skrag byed kyi ma yul gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms //
T02D2293:175b-10: sems nyid myos par gyur pa'i glang chen dbang po
T02D2293:175b-11: rgyud / rgyun mi 'chad par nam mkha'i phyogs su
T02D2293:175b-12: nyi zla 'khor // dge sdig gnyis kyi lcags sog 'then nas ka ba'i gnas su nyer par byed /
T02D2293:175b-13: nam mkha' gzhom med sgra ru gyur nas sems ni mya ngan 'das par bzhugs //
T02D2293:175b-14: bcud chen btung mtshos khams gsum lus btang snyoms so //
T02D2293:175b-15: yul lnga 'dren byed gang la gang du'ang mi mthun phyogs mi mthong //
T02D2293:175b-16: mi bzad nyi mas rab tu gdungs pas nam mkha'i 'khong sar 'gro zhing slebs //
T02D2293:175b-17: ma hendra yis smras pa 'di la byi te ci yang ngas ma mthong //
T02D2293:175b-18: ye shes kyi btung bas rab tu myos pa'i grub
T02D2293:175b-19: pa'i slob dpon sa 'dzin gyi thugs nyid grang po
T02D2293:175b-20: che'i dbang po dgongs pa'i skad kyis de kho na
T02D2293:175b-21: nyid kyi don rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rnam gsum
T02D2293:175b-22: ni sku'i dga' ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2293:175b-23: de la dbyer med pa nye bar spyod pa bzung
T02D2293:175b-24: nas ye shes kyi btung bas myos pa ni thob
T02D2293:175b-26: de bzhin du yang sku'i rnam pas thugs la thugs kyi rnam pas sku la //
T02D2293:175b-27: thugs las gsung gis rab tu brjod par gsungs so //
T02D2293:175b-28: de'i gnas las ye shes kyi sbrang gi btung bas
T02D2293:175b-29: rab tu dgyes pa'i grub pa'i slob dpon sa 'dzin
T02D2293:175b-30: gyi thugs nyid glang po che'i dbang po'o //
T02D2293:175b-31: gzhom med pa zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi sgra'o //
T02D2293:175b-32: rab tu 'jigs shing skrag pa ni stong pa nyid
T02D2293:175b-33: kyi gdangs thos nas mgrin par sgrogs par byed do
T02D2293:176a-0: // @176a * // de la gzhom du med pa'i sgra thos nas 'khor
T02D2293:176a-1: ba skrag par byed pa glo bur gyi phung po
T02D2293:176a-2: dang nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i bdud rnams 'joms
T02D2293:176a-3: par byed pa'o // de bzhin du ra ti badzra gyis kyang /
T02D2293:176a-4: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pa //
T02D2293:176a-5: gang gis sh'akya seng ge sogs //
T02D2293:176a-6: mkhas rnams kyis ni bdud kyi sde //
T02D2293:176a-7: mi bzad chen po'i stobs chen bcom //
T02D2293:176a-8: brtan pa'i rkang pas de'i shin tu dga' bas rab tu tshim pa gsal bar gsungs te /
T02D2293:176a-9: myos par gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:176a-10: ni de kho na nyid kyis myos pa'i phyir sems
T02D2293:176a-11: ni glang po che'i dbang po'o //
T02D2293:176a-12: nyi ma dang zla ba nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i
T02D2293:176a-13: rnam par rtog pa bshig nas nam mkha'i man ngag
T02D2293:176a-14: la bzhi pa'i dga' ba'i man ngag blangs nas rgyug
T02D2293:176a-15: par byed pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdzing bu
T02D2293:176a-17: rkang pa gnyis pas de kho na nyid gsal bar gsungs te /
T02D2293:176a-18: dge sdig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni sdig
T02D2293:176a-19: pa dang bsod nams dag 'khor ba'i zhags pa gnyis
T02D2293:176a-21: ka ba zhes pa ni ma rig pa'i ka ba 'joms pa'o //
T02D2293:176a-22: nam khar ta ge zhes pa ni gzhom du med
T02D2293:176a-23: pa'i sgras bskul bar gyur pas de nyid sems kyi
T02D2293:176a-24: glang po che'i dbang po mya ngan las 'das pa'i
T02D2293:176a-26: de bzhin du nag po spyod ba'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:176a-27: sa chu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2293:176a-28: rkang pa gsum pas rang gi sems dang gnyis su med par gsungs te /
T02D2293:176a-29: bcud chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dngos
T02D2293:176a-30: po dang dngos po med pa dag gcig pa'i gzung
T02D2293:176a-31: ba la rnam par go pa mi bya'o //
T02D2293:176a-32: de'i yul lnga rnams kyi 'dren pa de nyid drug pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o //
T02D2293:176a-33: slar yag nyon mongs pa'i mi mthun phyogs byed pa mi mthong ba'o //
T02D2293:176a-34: rkang pa bzhi pas rnam par mi rtog pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gsungs te /
T02D2293:176a-35: mi bzad nyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:176a-36: ni bde ba chen po'i 'dod chags kyi mes bskul
T02D2293:176a-37: bar gyur nas de nyid sems kyi glang po che'i
T02D2293:176b-0: @176b dbang po nam mkhar 'khor ba ni bde ba
T02D2293:176b-1: chen po'i 'khor lo'i rdzing bu 'gro zhing thob pa
T02D2293:176b-2: grub pa'i'o slob dpon sa 'dzin gyis de bzhin nyid
T02D2293:176b-3: gsung so // 'di la byin pa ni bdag gis
T02D2293:176b-4: 'di'i ngo bo nyid ci yang ma mthong ba ste
T02D2293:176b-5: gsung so // / nam par mi rtog pa'o //
T02D2293:176b-6: de bzhin du lung las kyang ;
T02D2293:176b-7: ji srid ji snyed rnam rtog pa //
T02D2293:176b-8: de snyed thams cad brdzun pa ste //
T02D2293:176b-9: bden pa de nyid de bzhin 'gyur //
T02D2293:176b-10: de nyid rnam par mi rtog pa //
T02D2293:176b-12: pa ta ha manydza ri'i glu dbyang pi wang zhabs kyi'o //
T02D2293:176b-13: nyi ma'i ku ba zla ba rgyud la sbyar //
T02D2293:176b-14: gzhom med dbyig drang aa wa dh'u t'ir byas //
T02D2293:176b-15: kye'i grogs he ru ka yi pi wang sgrogs //
T02D2293:176b-16: rgyud kyi sbra nyid snying rje sgrogs pa can //
T02D2293:176b-17: a'a lam k'a li gnyis kyi gnya' non shes //
T02D2293:176b-18: bza' mchog ro mnyam mtshan rnams brtsi byas nas //
T02D2293:176b-19: gang la shing dang shing bu mnan gyur na //
T02D2293:176b-20: de tshe rgyud kyi sgra yis kun du khyab //
T02D2293:176b-21: rgyal po gang byed lha mo glu len byed //
T02D2293:176b-22: sangs rgyas gar ni khyad par nyid du dka' //
T02D2293:176b-23: de kho na nyid kyi don he ru ka'i don
T02D2293:176b-24: rtogs pa'i pi wang zhabs kyis pi wang gi sgra'i
T02D2293:176b-25: sgo nas rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir nyi
T02D2293:176b-26: ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa la nyi ma'i
T02D2293:176b-27: snang ba ku ba'i rnam par bltas nas zla ba'i
T02D2293:176b-28: snang bas rgyud du byas te /
T02D2293:176b-29: yul gyi 'khor lo can aa wa dh'u t'ir lhan
T02D2293:176b-30: cig byas nas gzhom du med pa'i sgra dbyig pa
T02D2293:176b-31: la sbyar te / kye'i grogs mo bdag med ma
T02D2293:176b-32: pi wang zhags kyis pi wang gi sgo nas dpal
T02D2293:176b-33: he ru ka'i yi ge bzhi po'i don gzhom du
T02D2293:176b-34: med pa'i sgra'i dbyangs su brjod do //
T02D2293:176b-35: de'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi sgra'i dgongs pa'i skad
T02D2293:176b-36: kyis 'od gsal ba ni gzhom du med pa'i gzugs
T02D2293:176b-37: so // de nyid srid pa las rnam par grol bar byed pa ste /
T02D2293:176b-38: srid par 'ching bar byed pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2293:176b-39: de bzhin du dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang /
T02D2293:176b-40: dngos por 'ching ba gsad par bya //
T02D2293:176b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:176b-42: de bzhin du glu dbyangs gzhan las kyang /
T02D2293:176b-43: srid pa za yis 'ching ba ma yin glo bur ya mtshan can //
T02D2293:176b-44: gang gis 'jig rten 'ching yang rnal 'byor de yis grol ba'ang byed //
T02D2293:177a-1: bas de'i don bstan par byed do //
T02D2293:177a-2: a'a li zhes bya ba la sogs pa a'a li
T02D2293:177a-3: dang k'a li'i yi ge rnams kyi nang nas snying
T02D2293:177a-4: po'i yi ge aa yin te /
T02D2293:177a-5: de bzhin du mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las kyang //
T02D2293:177a-6: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog / ces pas
T02D2293:177a-7: de la mi 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid rtogs pas
T02D2293:177a-8: bza' mchog ni sems kyi rgyal po'i nyes pa'i mtshams
T02D2293:177a-9: kyi bu ga brtsis nas de nyid pi wang zhabs
T02D2293:177a-10: kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi sgra'i sgo
T02D2293:177a-11: nas rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gsungs so //
T02D2293:177a-12: de bzhin du lung las kyang /
T02D2293:177a-13: rags par sgra yi dngos por gsungs //
T02D2293:177a-14: de bzhin phra mor sems dngos te //
T02D2293:177a-15: sems nyid dang bral gang yin pa //
T02D2293:177a-16: de nyid rnal 'byor mi bzad gnas //
T02D2293:177a-17: rkang pa gsum pa sa ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gsungs te /
T02D2293:177a-18: k'a li zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sna'i
T02D2293:177a-19: shing ni sems te sems kyi rnga mong rtogs par
T02D2293:177a-20: bya'o // shing bu ni phra mo ste snying rje
T02D2293:177a-21: gzhom du med pa'i cha 'od gsal du rtogs par
T02D2293:177a-22: bya'o // bya'o // gang la mtshan nyid dang bral
T02D2293:177a-23: ba'i dus su sems kyi rnga mo des 'od gsal
T02D2293:177a-24: 'dren pas na mnan par gyur pa ni kun du
T02D2293:177a-25: 'gro bas de'i tshe rtsa gsum cu so gnyis lha'i
T02D2293:177a-26: bya'o // bya'o // gzugs so ; ; sgra zhes
T02D2293:177a-27: pa ni gzhom du med pa bdag med ma'i ye
T02D2293:177a-28: shes kyi thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid dngos
T02D2293:177a-29: po dang dngos po med pa la khyab pa zhes
T02D2293:177a-30: bya'o // bya'o // gzugs so ; so // de bzhin du sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:177a-31: de la de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2293:177a-32: rkang pa bzhi pas 'bras bu thob pa'i dga' bas
T02D2293:177a-33: rdo rje'i rkang stabs kyi gar byed pa zhes so
T02D2293:177a-34: // gar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni pi wang zhabs te /
T02D2293:177a-35: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang gi gar byed pa'o //
T02D2293:177a-36: de rnams kyi lha mo ni rnal 'byor ma bdag
T02D2293:177a-37: med ma la sogs pas rdo rje'i glus bkra shis
T02D2293:177a-38: bar byed pa'o // de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi gar
T02D2293:177a-39: ni khyad par 'phyags shing lhag pa'i cha yis sems
T02D2293:177a-40: can pa rnams mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro
T02D2293:177a-41: bar byed pa'o // // de bzhin du brtag pa gnyis pa las kyang /
T02D2293:177a-42: gal te dga' ba phun sum tshogs //
T02D2293:177a-43: thar ba'i rgyu yis gar nyid do //
T02D2293:177b-0: @177b zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D2293:177b-1: glu dbyangs chen po zhes bya ba nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyi'o //
T02D2293:177b-2: sa gsum po la bdag ni 'bad med 'jug / bdag ni nyal nas bde ba chen pos rol //
T02D2293:177b-3: ji ltar dombi ni khyod skra yangs kyi //
T02D2293:177b-4: mtha' rigs skye ba'i nang na ka pa'i li //
T02D2293:177b-5: kye ma khyod ni rnam par nyams byed de //
T02D2293:177b-6: bya ba byed pa ri bong 'dzin pa 'joms //
T02D2293:177b-7: gang dang gang yang khyod ni ngan par brjod //
T02D2293:177b-8: rigs ldan skye bo khyod kyi mgul nas 'khyud //
T02D2293:177b-9: 'dod pa gtum mo'i glu ni k'ahnas blangs /
T02D2293:177b-10: gdol ba mo las lhag pa'i dmangs rigs med//
T02D2293:177b-11: don de nyid don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi
T02D2293:177b-12: bden pa'i don khong du chud pas nag po spyod
T02D2293:177b-13: pa'i zhabs kyis dombi ni dgongs pa'i skad kyis gsungs
T02D2293:177b-14: te / gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2293:177b-15: nag po spyod pa bdag gis rdo rje'i btsun mo
T02D2293:177b-16: la mngon par chags pas sa gsum gyi lus dang
T02D2293:177b-18: de'i drug cu lhag pa'i brgya'i rang bzhin gyis nyes pa 'bad pa med pas 'gog pa ste /
T02D2293:177b-20: rol zhes pa ni rol rtsed kyis rnal 'byor pa
T02D2293:177b-21: gnyid du song ba dang bdag med ma'i chos khong
T02D2293:177b-22: du chud pa'o // dhu'i rkang pas yongs su ma
T02D2293:177b-23: dag pa'i aa wa dh'u t'i pa khro bar byed
T02D2293:177b-24: du chud pa'o // pa'o / ji ltar zhes bya
T02D2293:177b-25: ba la sogs pa ni skra yangs kye ni mi
T02D2293:177b-26: rta par sgro 'dogs pas kye'i dombi ni yongs su
T02D2293:177b-27: ma dag pa'i aa wa dh'u t'i pa khyod kyis
T02D2293:177b-28: du chud pa'o // pa'o / ci zhig byed //
T02D2293:177b-29: gang zhig lus la thims na gang gis 'od gsal
T02D2293:177b-30: mi shes pa'i dbang gis de rnams phyi rol du
T02D2293:177b-31: du chud pa'o // pa'o / ci zhig byed //
T02D2293:177b-32: byed do // kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems skyong
T02D2293:177b-33: bar byed pa'i phyir ka p'a la ni de yis
T02D2293:177b-34: dombi ni yongs su mngag pa'i aa wa dh'u t'i
T02D2293:177b-35: pa gang gis lha dang lha ma yin dang mi
T02D2293:177b-36: la sogs pa khams gsum pa thams cad log pa'i
T02D2293:177b-37: shes pas rnam par nyams par byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D2293:177b-38: du chud pa'o // pa'o / ci zhig byed //
T02D2293:177b-39: byed do // // gang de nyid 'joms pa ni
T02D2293:177b-40: ri bong 'dzin pa kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems
T02D2293:177b-41: 'od gsal gyi rgyur gyur pa man ngag dang bral
T02D2293:177b-42: ba'i rnal 'byor pas 'joms shing rnam par nyams par
T02D2293:177b-43: du chud pa'o // pa'o / ci zhig byed //
T02D2293:177b-44: byed do // // byed pa'o // de bzhin du
T02D2293:178a-0: @178a * // dong du lhung na ga pur 'jig par byed //
T02D2293:178a-1: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2293:178a-2: rkang pa gsum pas dombi ni'i rang bzhin gsungs te /
T02D2293:178a-3: gang dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gang
T02D2293:178a-4: zhig de rnams kyis kyang rang bzhin gyis mngon par
T02D2293:178a-5: shes pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yongs su
T02D2293:178a-6: dag pa'i dombi ni khyod mi shes so //
T02D2293:178a-7: de rnams kyang las kyi dbang gis skye bas 'khor
T02D2293:178a-8: ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong zhing 'gal bar smra
T02D2293:178a-9: bar 'gyur ro // de rnams las gang phyogs gcig
T02D2293:178a-10: tu rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug yang dag par rdo
T02D2293:178a-11: rje dang padma mnyam du sbyor ba las mi 'dzag
T02D2293:178a-12: pa'i bde bde yis khyod rab tu rig par bya'o
T02D2293:178a-13: bar 'gyur ro // // de rnams kyis kyang 'gul
T02D2293:178a-14: ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor nyin dang mtshan
T02D2293:178a-15: du yongs su mi 'dor ba zhes so //
T02D2293:178a-16: de bzhin du lung las kyang /
T02D2293:178a-17: kakko la dang dga' ba'i bo bla phrad pa de yis dga' ba 'phro ba kundu ru //
T02D2293:178a-18: de ma thag tu chu yis sbyor zhing lag pa 'khrid pa skal ba dang ldan 'khor lo can //
T02D2293:178a-19: chu yis gsher zhing mdzes pa'i mtsho skyes 'dab ma'i btung bar mchu nyid rnam par kun du chags //
T02D2293:178a-20: dur khrod gnas su gnas par rtag tu rab tu dga' ba 'ga' zhig rnal 'byor bas //
T02D2293:178a-21: rkang pa bzhi pas rnal 'byor ma'i bsngags pa gsungs
T02D2293:178a-22: tek'hna zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di 'dra'i
T02D2293:178a-23: las kyi gnas sgrub pa'i thabs gtu mo'i glu dbyangs
T02D2293:178a-24: nag po spyod pa pas gzhan du blangs pa ni
T02D2293:178a-25: gzhan ma yin pas dombi ni dang bral na gzhan
T02D2293:178a-26: dmangs rigs med na yang grong khyer ma nyid yod
T02D2293:178a-27: pa'o // gang gi phyir na sems can gyi dbye bas thob par bya ba'i gnas yod pa'o //
T02D2293:178a-28: de bzhin du yang ye shes yang dag par byang
T02D2293:178a-29: chub pa la sems nyid kyi sa bon chen po
T02D2293:178a-30: la srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag
T02D2293:178a-31: kyang kun rdzob la kun rdzob kyi phyir shin du
T02D2293:178a-32: mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo nyid mi gnas
T02D2293:178a-33: pa'o // bhee ra ba'i zhes bya ba'i glu dbyangs nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyi'o //
T02D2293:178a-34: srid dang ma yu nga 'das pa pa ta ha dang rang bo che //
T02D2293:178b-0: yid dang rlung dag gnyis po khar rnga sgrogs @178b par byed //
T02D2293:178b-1: rgyal gyur rgyal gyur mkha' la rnga chen sgra //
T02D2293:178b-2: k'ahnas dombi n'i ni bag mar blangs //
T02D2293:178b-3: g-yung mos bag ma len pa'i kha zas sbyar //
T02D2293:178b-4: zhal mthong ston mo bla med chos nyid do //
T02D2293:178b-5: nyid mtshan shin tu dga' ba'i grogs dang 'grogs //
T02D2293:178b-6: rnal 'byor ma yi dra bar nams langs gyur //
T02D2293:178b-7: kye'i dombi grogs dang gang gang dga' //
T02D2293:178b-8: skad cig mi 'dor lhan cig skyes pas myos //
T02D2293:178b-9: de kho na nyid kyi don bstan bor byed pa'i
T02D2293:178b-10: nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis glu dbyangs gzhan mngon
T02D2293:178b-11: par gsungs te / srid dang mya ngan 'das zhes
T02D2293:178b-12: bya ba la sogs pa ni 'khor ba dang mya
T02D2293:178b-13: ngan las 'das pa dag yid dang rlung la sogs
T02D2293:178b-14: pa rnam par mi rtog pa sngon du gsungs pa'i
T02D2293:178b-15: rim pas yongs su byangs pa rnga pa ta ha
T02D2293:178b-16: la sogs pa snod du nye bar bltas te bde
T02D2293:178b-17: ba chen po'i grogs bzung nas dombi n'i ni de
T02D2293:178b-18: nyid khu ba'i rtsa yongs su ma dag pa'i aa
T02D2293:178b-19: wa dh'u t'i pa de'i 'dzag pa gzhom pa'i phyir
T02D2293:178b-20: nag po spyod pa'i zhabs gang gi tshe rab tu
T02D2293:178b-22: rgyal bar gyur cig rgyal bar gyur cig ces pa
T02D2293:178b-23: ni sgra dang me tog gi char dang rnga bo
T02D2293:178b-24: che la sogs pa'i rtags nam mkha' la rab tu
T02D2293:178b-26: rkang pa gnyis pas dombi n'i bag ma'i 'bras bu gsungs te /
T02D2293:178b-27: dombi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ni
T02D2293:178b-28: de kho na nyid dombi n'i rlung gi ngo bo
T02D2293:178b-29: de'i 'gro ba'i sgo nas 'gro ba gzhom par bya'o
T02D2293:178b-30: // skye ba'i zhes pa ni skye ba dang 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'joms pa'o //
T02D2293:178b-31: de'i phyir zhal mthong ston mo ni nyon mongs pa
T02D2293:178b-32: med pa bla na med pa'i chos nyid mngon sum
T02D2293:178b-33: du byas pa nag po spyod pa bdag gis zhes
T02D2293:178b-34: so // rkang pa gsum pas rnal 'byor ma'i stobs gsungs te /
T02D2293:178b-35: nyin mtshan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dis
T02D2293:178b-36: ye shes kyi rgya mtshor lhan cig rnal 'byor gyi
T02D2293:178b-37: dbang phyug gang gis nyin dang mtshan du shin tu
T02D2293:178b-38: dga' ba dang mngon par 'grogs par gyur pa'o //
T02D2293:178b-39: de'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyag gi rnal 'byor ma'i
T02D2293:178b-40: dra ba zhes pa ni de'i ye shes kyi 'od
T02D2293:178b-41: zer ro // nam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sangs pa'o //
T02D2293:179a-2: bdag nyid thim gyur bcom ldan 'das ni srog gi bdag po ste //
T02D2293:179a-3: dbugs ni 'byung rngub gyur pa rab zhi srog gi me 'di nyid /
T02D2293:179a-4: gang gis 'od zer rab brgyad 'od gsal rnal 'byor dbang phyug ste //
T02D2293:179a-5: 'di yis rang lus nyid las de nyid phyung nas mun pa bcom //
T02D2293:179a-6: zhes pa ni 'jig rten gsum kun du gnon pa'o //
T02D2293:179a-7: rkang pa bzhi pas rnal 'byor ma'i drin las rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi spyod pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:179a-8: dombi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dombi'i de nyid
T02D2293:179a-9: ni rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i aa wa dh'u
T02D2293:179a-10: t'i pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2293:179a-11: de'i shin du mngon par dga' ba la mngon par chags pa'i rnal 'byor ba'i dga' ba'o //
T02D2293:179a-12: de dang de rnams ye shes kyi phyag rgya bde
T02D2293:179a-13: ba chen po'i dga' ba 'dzin pa'i phyir skad cig
T02D2293:179a-14: kyang yongs su mi 'dor ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2293:179a-15: de bzhin du sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:179a-16: kun du dngos med gyur ldan 'bab //
T02D2293:179a-17: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2293:179a-18: pa ta manydza r'i zhes bya ba'i glu dbyangs kukku r'i'i zhabs kyi'o /
T02D2293:179a-19: dbang gi chags med nam mkha'i yid kyi bdag / bdag gi nyams myong ji ltar smra rgyu med //
T02D2293:179a-20: kye'i mi khyod spangs nas mtha' mar lta //
T02D2293:179a-21: gang zhig 'dir na 'bab pa de 'dir med //
T02D2293:179a-22: dang por bdag gi rnam shes bag chag gtums //
T02D2293:179a-23: rtsa la rnam dpyod de nyid ba pu d'a //
T02D2293:179a-24: bdag ni gzhon nu dar ma rdzogs par gyur //
T02D2293:179a-25: rtsa bar ltung ba nye bar sdud par byed //
T02D2293:179a-26: kukku r'i pa'i srid pa brtan par smra //
T02D2293:179a-27: 'di ni gang shes de ni dpa' bo ste //
T02D2293:179a-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gyi
T02D2293:179a-29: bdud rtsi'i btung bas yongs su tshim pa'i kukku r'i
T02D2293:179a-30: pa'i zhabs kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi
T02D2293:179a-31: bdag nyid ba com ldan 'das ma bdag med ma'i
T02D2293:179a-32: rnal 'byor ma la lhag par mos nas smras pa
T02D2293:179a-33: // bdag ni chags med ce bya ba la sogs
T02D2293:179a-34: pa'i bdag ni bcom ldan 'das ma bdag med ma
T02D2293:179a-36: kun nas chags pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2293:179a-37: nam mkha'i yid can zhes pa ni thams cad stong
T02D2293:179b-0: pa la yid kyi bdag po @179b 'di'i shin du
T02D2293:179b-1: bde ba la mngon par chags pa sa bdag gi
T02D2293:179b-2: khyad par du 'phags pa yang dag pa'i sbyor ba
T02D2293:179b-3: mi 'gyur pa'i bde ba myong ba gang du yang
T02D2293:179b-4: smra ru yod pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D2293:179b-5: dh'u'i rkang pas de'i don brtan par gsungs te /
T02D2293:179b-6: spangs nas zhes bya ba la sog pa ni de
T02D2293:179b-7: nyid las mtha' ma ni mthar thag pa'i bde ba
T02D2293:179b-8: chen po'i 'khor lo'i khyim du bltas nas 'phro ba'o
T02D2293:179b-9: // yul la sogs pa'i tshogs pa la bdag gis
T02D2293:179b-10: bdag med pa de'i dus su sel ba de'i mthu
T02D2293:179b-11: las mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D2293:179b-12: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D2293:179b-13: chen po'i gnas la sku mdzes par gyur pas khyod
T02D2293:179b-14: kye'i sku rdo rje lags so zhes bdag nyid la
T02D2293:179b-15: rang gis bos nas gsungs pa'o //
T02D2293:179b-16: rkang pa bzhi pas mngon sum du byas pas te /
T02D2293:179b-17: smra bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir kun rdzob byang chub sems ni srid pa'o //
T02D2293:179b-18: brtan pa zhes pa ni brtan por byas nas shes
T02D2293:179b-19: rab kyi chu skyes la rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
T02D2293:179b-20: gang dang gang du dmigs pa me pa'i ngo bos
T02D2293:179b-21: khong du chud pa de dang de rnams kyis 'dir
T02D2293:179b-22: srid pa'i dkyil 'khor yul gyi dgra 'joms pa'i phyir
T02D2293:179b-23: dpa' bo'o // de bzhin du nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:179b-24: gang gis shes pa rgyun chad med pa lhan skyes skad cig gis //
T02D2293:179b-25: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2293:179b-26: bra r'a d'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glu dbyangs 'du shes gsum pa'i zhabs kyi'o //
T02D2293:179b-27: mtshan mo mun par bgyi ba rgyu byed cing //
T02D2293:179b-28: bdud rtsi'i kha zas byi bas za bar byed //
T02D2293:179b-29: kye'i rnal 'byor rlung byi ma bsad cing //
T02D2293:179b-30: gang gis 'gro dang 'ong ba ma bkag na //
T02D2293:179b-31: srid pa rnams 'joms byi bas rtsig pa 'bugs //
T02D2293:179b-32: g-yo ba'i byi bas snod rnams ba zhing 'joms //
T02D2293:179b-33: byi ba sgra gcan spu dang kha dog med //
T02D2293:179b-34: nam mkha' rkang pas 'gro zhing yid kyi chos //
T02D2293:179b-35: de che byi ba mchong zhing rab tu 'gro //
T02D2293:179b-36: bla ma dam pa'i gsung gis g-yo med bya //
T02D2293:179b-37: gang du byi ba 'di yi rkang pa bcad byas na //
T02D2293:179b-38: de tsheb cings grol bh'u su ku la smra //
T02D2293:180a-0: don de nyid byi ba dgongs pa'i skad kyis 'du shes @180a * //
T02D2293:180a-1: gsum pa'i zhabs kyis gsungs te /
T02D2293:180a-2: mtshan mo mun pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:180a-3: ni rku ba'i phyir byi ba dgongs pa'i skad kyis
T02D2293:180a-4: sems dang rlung du rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2293:180a-5: mtshan mo ni shes rab las kyi phyag rgya'i yan lag tu rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2293:180a-6: de'i las kyi yan lag gang du sna tshogs pa
T02D2293:180a-7: la sogs pa'i skad cig pa'i sku'i dga' ba la
T02D2293:180a-8: sogs pa bya ba'i sgo nas rdo rje dang chu
T02D2293:180a-9: skyes snyoms par sbyor ba'i byang chub kyi sems bdud
T02D2293:180a-10: rtsi'i zas de nyid kyi byi ba sems dang rlung
T02D2293:180a-12: de la khyad par gyi dga' ba'i skad cig la
T02D2293:180a-13: dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nas thos pa'i thabs kyi
T02D2293:180a-14: myur du de'i rang bzhin med par bya'o //
T02D2293:180a-15: byed pa ni byis pa'i rnal 'byor pas de dang
T02D2293:180a-16: bral bar byas nas 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'gro ba
T02D2293:180a-17: dang 'ong ba rnams pa gnyis mi 'chad pas sems
T02D2293:180a-19: de bzhin du lung las kyang /
T02D2293:180a-20: rnam pa gnyis spong rab gsal mkhas pas rang rig
T02D2293:180a-21: skal bzang tshogs pa gcig / dga' bas khyab pa
T02D2293:180a-22: stobs can ro yis gang ba nam mkha'i mthil du'o
T02D2293:180a-23: // rnam pa sna tshogs rab 'phro sems 'khrugs zhi ba de nang song ba yis /
T02D2293:180a-24: 'dir ni de nyi 'jig rten gsum po thim gyur yid ni gsal bar byed //
T02D2293:180a-25: rkang pa gnyis pas byi ba sems kyi tha snyad kyi rjes su bsngags pa gsung te /
T02D2293:180a-26: srid pa zhe bya ba la sogs pa ni 'byung
T02D2293:180a-27: bar byed pa'i phyir srid pa rang lus rnam par
T02D2293:180a-29: rang bzhin gyi g-yo ba de yis de nyid sems kyi byi ba gzhan gyi ngo bor byed de /
T02D2293:180a-30: rtsigs pa ni dud 'gro dang dmyal ba la sogs
T02D2293:180a-31: pa ngan 'gro rnams su lhung ba yang rang nyid
T02D2293:180a-33: de'i phyir sems kyi byi ba'i rang bzhin gyi skyon bgrangs nas //
T02D2293:180a-34: kye'i rnal 'byor ba man ngag thos pa de yis
T02D2293:180a-35: de'i dngos por sgro btags par mi bya'o zhes so
T02D2293:180a-36: // rkang pa gsum pas de'i ngo bo gsungs te //
T02D2293:180a-37: nag po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni kun
T02D2293:180b-0: rdzobs byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba @180b 'joms
T02D2293:180b-1: pa nyid kyis de nyid sems kyi byi ba sgra
T02D2293:180b-2: gcan no // de'i phung po za bas dbye bas
T02D2293:180b-3: rnam par dpyod pas kye'i rnal 'byor ba gdams pa
T02D2293:180b-5: nam mkha' zhes pa ni bla ma'i man ngag las
T02D2293:180b-6: bde ba chen po'i chu skyes kyi tshal du songs
T02D2293:180b-7: nas slar 'ong ba don dam pa byang chub kyi
T02D2293:180b-8: sems sbrang gi btung ba'i ro myong bar byed pa'o
T02D2293:180b-9: // de bzhin du yang phyi rol gyi lta ba pa m'i na n'a thas //
T02D2293:180b-10: bla ma yis ni don dam gsungs pa'i lam gyi rim pa ting 'dzin sgro glegs can //
T02D2293:180b-11: chu skyes rnams rgyas gsung la gshin rje'i rgyal med chu skyes sbrang rtsi bung ba 'thung //
T02D2293:180b-12: rkang pa bzhi pas rdo rje bla ma'i bdag nyid che ba gsungs te /
T02D2293:180b-13: da'i tshe zhes bya ba la sog pa ni sems
T02D2293:180b-14: kyi byi ba 'di de srid pa de ni rmongs
T02D2293:180b-15: pa dang nga rgyal zhi bar mi 'gyur ro /
T02D2293:180b-16: gang gi tshe chu skyes kyi tshal du song nas
T02D2293:180b-17: bla ma dam pa'i gsung gi 'khrul 'khor gyis nyams
T02D2293:180b-19: kye'i rnal 'byor pa de'i phyir bla ma'i bzhed pa btsal bar bya'o zhes so //
T02D2293:180b-20: de bzhin du sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:180b-21: gang gi drin gyi 'od zer gyis /
T02D2293:180b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so ;
T02D2293:180b-23: ; rkang pa lnga pas sems kyi byi ba'i rang bzhin gsungs te /
T02D2293:180b-24: gang du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gang
T02D2293:180b-25: gi tshe lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la sems
T02D2293:180b-27: nga zhes rkyen gyis brtags pa rgyun gcod pa'o //
T02D2293:180b-28: de'i tshe 'khor bar 'ching ba gcod ba'o ;
T02D2293:180b-29: / de bzhin du lung las kyang //
T02D2293:180b-30: de nyid la ni 'khor ba med //
T02D2293:180b-33: de bzhin grol byas grol bar bya //
T02D2293:180b-34: log par sgro btags byas de las //
T02D2293:180b-35: thag sbrul grib ma sha za 'khrul //
T02D2293:180b-36: cung zad ma spangs ma bzung bar //
T02D2293:180b-37: rol pas legs gnas skabs ji bzhin //
T02D2293:180b-38: gunydza ri zhes bya ba'i glu dbyangs sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis so //
T02D2293:180b-39: rang gi rtogs byas 'khor ba mya nyan 'das //
T02D2293:180b-40: log ltas 'jig rten rang nyid 'ching bar byed //
T02D2293:181a-2: skye dang 'chi ba'i srid pa ji ltar yin //
T02D2293:181a-3: ji ltar skye dang 'chi ba de bzhin du //
T02D2293:181a-4: gson dang shi ba dag la khyad par med //
T02D2293:181a-5: gang 'dir skye 'chi dag la the tshom med //
T02D2293:181a-6: de byed gser 'gyur bcud len sgrub par byed //
T02D2293:181a-7: gang gi g-yo dang mi g-yor bcas par 'khyam //
T02D2293:181a-8: de rnams rga dang 'chi bar cis mi 'gyur //
T02D2293:181a-9: skye las las sam ci ste las las skye //
T02D2293:181a-10: sa ra has smras bsam med pa de chos //
T02D2293:181a-11: don de nyid chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis gsungs te /
T02D2293:181a-12: rang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thog
T02D2293:181a-13: ma med pa'i ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi skyon
T02D2293:181a-14: gyis srid pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa rtog
T02D2293:181a-15: par sgro btags shing byas pa'i phyir 'jig rten 'dir
T02D2293:181a-16: 'khyam zhing rang nyid kyis srid par 'ching ba dang
T02D2293:181a-17: grol bar byed ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2293:181a-18: dhr'u'i rkang pas rang gi ye shes brtan par byed de /
T02D2293:181a-19: bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grub
T02D2293:181a-20: pa'i slob dpon sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis de lta
T02D2293:181a-21: bu nyid gsungs pa ni bla ma'i zhabs kyi drin
T02D2293:181a-22: las dngos po'i ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas
T02D2293:181a-23: bsam du med pa'i rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid do
T02D2293:181a-24: // de'i phyir skye dang zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2293:181a-25: pas 'jig rten pa ji lta ba bzhin du gyur
T02D2293:181a-26: // pa zhes pa'o // de bzhin du yang tshigs

T02D2293:184b-19: nam mkha' khengs gyur zhes pa ni yongs su dag
T02D2293:184b-20: pa'i 'od gsal gyis yongs su sbyar bar byas pas
T02D2293:184b-21: so sor lta ba dang ldan pas bdag gnas pa'o
T02D2293:184b-22: // de bzhin du brtag pa gnyis pa las kyang /
T02D2293:184b-23: lus dang bral ba'i sems nyid ni //
T02D2293:184b-24: gzhan du spang bar bya ba med //
T02D2293:184b-26: rkang pa gsum pas yid ches pa'i tshogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:184b-27: gzhom du med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2293:184b-28: thags bzangs ni dgongs pa'i skad kyis srog dang rtsol
T02D2293:184b-29: ba thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyis rlung
T02D2293:184b-30: gnyis la gzhom du med pa'i sgra dang gzugs brnyan
T02D2293:184b-31: yongs su rtog pa zhes so //
T02D2293:184b-32: lhan cig skyes pa'i sgra brnyan dang //
T02D2293:184b-33: de nyid kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems bla ma dam pa'i gsung gis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2293:184b-34: gnas gnyis chad gyur zhes pa ni dngos po dang
T02D2293:184b-35: dngos po med par 'dzin pa dag bcad nas rdo
T02D2293:184b-36: rje dang chu skyes yang dag par sbyor ba bstan
T02D2293:184b-37: pas mi phyed par bdag gis bya'o zhes so //
T02D2293:184b-38: rkang pa bzhi pas rnal 'byor pa'i rjes su bsngags pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:185a-0: nor bus son pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni chos thams cad rang @185a * //
T02D2293:185a-1: bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i khod du chud pa las
T02D2293:185a-2: dar ma'i skye bo dang 'khyud pas de nyid rang
T02D2293:185a-3: bzhin gyis yongs su gyur pa aa wa dh'u t'i
T02D2293:185a-5: nor bur gnas zhes pa ni 'thag pa'i tshul tha ga'i zhabs bdag gis thob pa'o //
T02D2293:185a-6: de'i phyir de'i drin las gti mug gis mngon par
T02D2293:185a-7: 'khyud pa'i srad bus bcings pa rnam par dral bar
T02D2293:185a-8: 'gyur pa'o // thag ces pa ni skyes pa'i chos
T02D2293:185a-9: dang rnam par bral nas rdo rje 'dzin par gyur
T02D2293:185a-10: 'gyur pa'o // to zhes pa'o // de bzhin du sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:185a-11: de ni dpal ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2293:185a-12: sha ba ri zhes bya ba'i glu dbyangs zhi ba'i zhabs kyi'o //
T02D2293:185a-13: tshad mas brtags shing brtags pa'i cha shas cha //
T02D2293:185a-14: cha shas cha shas brtags na lhag ma med //
T02D2293:185a-15: de nyid phyir na gzugs ni ma rnyed do //
T02D2293:185a-16: sh'antis smras pa ci zhig sgom par byed //
T02D2293:185a-17: tshad mas brtags brtags stong pa nyid du song //
T02D2293:185a-18: slar yang blangs nas rang gi 'gog par byed //
T02D2293:185a-19: rnam pa gnyis 'bab lam ni ma mthong ste //
T02D2293:185a-20: sh'antis smras pa skra rtse'i cha mi shong //
T02D2293:185a-21: bya ba byed pa zung dag yod ma yin //
T02D2293:185a-22: rang gis rig pas sh'anti pa yis smras //
T02D2293:185a-23: ye shes kyi dga' ba'i bde bas gang zhing brlan
T02D2293:185a-24: pa grub pa'i slob dpon sh'anti pas don de nyid
T02D2293:185a-25: skye bo rnams kyi phyir rab tu gsungs so //
T02D2293:185a-26: tul zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rang bzhin
T02D2293:185a-27: gyis nyes pa nyid tshad mas gzhal bar rig pa
T02D2293:185a-28: ni 'jig rten gsum dang lus ngag yid kyi 'dir
T02D2293:185a-29: g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba la sogs pa'i dbye
T02D2293:185a-30: bas cha shas can gcig tshad mas skyes par byas
T02D2293:185a-31: pa'i rang bzhin cha shas drug tu bsgrub par byas
T02D2293:185a-32: nas de nyid kyi cha shas rdul phra rab gon
T02D2293:185a-33: bu'i rdul phran cha drug tu dngos po med par
T02D2293:185a-34: phye zhing phye bas cha shas med pa'o //
T02D2293:185a-35: cha shas med pas mtshon pa de nyid kyang rgyu
T02D2293:185a-36: dang bral ba'i phyir de'i sems kyi rgyu'i phyir rjes
T02D2293:185a-39: dngos po de la dmigs pa dang dngos po med pa la ci zhig bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2293:185b-0: de bzhin @185b du yang shes rab le'u las //
T02D2293:185b-1: rnam par dpyad byas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2293:185b-2: rkang pa gnyis pas don de nyid brtan par byed do //
T02D2293:185b-3: tshad mas brtags zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2293:185b-4: de rnam par dpyod pa'i tshad mas yang cha shas
T02D2293:185b-6: / stong pa zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba la sems rab tu zhugs pa'o //
T02D2293:185b-7: de la bdag gis 'od gsal bzung nas 'gog pa
T02D2293:185b-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bdag tu 'dzin
T02D2293:185b-9: pa'i bsgom par bya ba dang /
T02D2293:185b-10: sgom pa po'i ngo bo 'gog pa zhes so //
T02D2293:185b-11: de bzhin du brtag pa gnyis pa las kyang /
T02D2293:185b-12: bsgom med sgom pa po yang med //
T02D2293:185b-13: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2293:185b-14: rkang pa gsum pas lam gyi rjes su bsngags pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:185b-15: 'bab ces bya ba la sogs pa ni 'dir mchog
T02D2293:185b-16: gi lam la gnyis su med pa'i phyir rnam pa
T02D2293:185b-18: de'i phyir sh'anti'i zhabs kyis gsungs te /
T02D2293:185b-19: 'dir skra'i rtse mo'i cha'i chos kyis zhugs na de'ang ring ba nyid do //
T02D2293:185b-20: yang na skra'i rtse kha'i mtshams kyi cha 'dir med pa'o //
T02D2293:185b-21: de bzhin du klu sgrub zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:185b-22: de yi lus la khong seng med //
T02D2293:185b-23: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2293:185b-24: rkang pa bzhi pas rang bzhin la dmigs pa gsungs te /
T02D2293:185b-25: bya ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grub
T02D2293:185b-26: pa'i slob dpon sh'anti'i zhabs kyis rang nyid bya ba
T02D2293:185b-27: dang byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir bla na med
T02D2293:185b-29: 'di nyid tshad ma'i rigs pas bskyed pa bla ma
T02D2293:185b-30: dam pa'i drin las bla na med pa'i go 'phang
T02D2293:185b-32: de bzhin du brtag pa gnyis pa las kyang /
T02D2293:185b-33: bla ma'i rim pa nyer bsten pas //
T02D2293:185b-34: gya nom pa nyid bdag gis shes ;
T02D2293:185b-35: /'dod pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i glu dbyangs 'du shes gsum pa'i zhabs kyi'o //
T02D2293:185b-36: nam phyed chu skyes khengs rgyas sum cu gnyis //
T02D2293:185b-37: rnal 'byor ma rnams de la yan lag tshim //
T02D2293:185b-38: ri bong 'dzin lam aa wa dh'u t'ir bskyod //
T02D2293:186a-0: rin chen tshig ni lhan cig skyes @186a * //
T02D2293:186a-2: ri bong 'dzin bskyod mya ngan 'das par 'gro //
T02D2293:186a-3: padma can ni padmar 'bab pa'i chu //
T02D2293:186a-4: khyad par dga' ba mtshan nyid dang bral ba //
T02D2293:186a-5: gang gis de shes de ni sangs rgyas so //
T02D2293:186a-6: bhu su kus smras bdag gis tshogs ba shes //
T02D2293:186a-7: lhan cig skyes dga' bde ba chan por rol //
T02D2293:186a-8: don de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i ros yongs su
T02D2293:186a-9: gang ba'i grub pa'i slob dpon bhu su kus gsungs
T02D2293:186a-10: te / nam phyed ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:186a-11: ni de la dbang gi le'ur gsungs pa'i cho ga
T02D2293:186a-12: te / las / nam phyed kyi thun mtshams bzhi
T02D2293:186a-13: la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ster ba'i dus
T02D2293:186a-14: su rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi chu skyes
T02D2293:186a-15: ni bdag gi gtsug tor gyi chu skyes su rnam
T02D2293:186a-16: te / las / par rgyas pa'o // de'u dus
T02D2293:186a-17: la rnal 'byor ma sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes pa
T02D2293:186a-18: ni sum cu rtsa gnyis byang chub kyi sems 'bab
T02D2293:186a-19: pa la la n'a dang ra sa n'a dang ;
T02D2293:186a-20: aa wa dh'u t'i me phyed ma phra mo'i gzugs la sogs par rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2293:186a-21: de'i gnas su 'bab par byed do //
T02D2293:186a-22: de rnams kyi dga' ba la sogs pa'i tshogs pas yan lag yang dag par tshim par gyur pa'o //
T02D2293:186a-23: bhr'u'i rkang pa dang lhan cig pa'i bla ma'i stobs gsungs te /
T02D2293:186a-24: dus der de'i rgyus ri bong 'dzin pa byang chub
T02D2293:186a-25: kyi sems kyi zla ba aa wa dh'u t'i'i lam
T02D2293:186a-26: gyi rdo rje'i rtse mor son pa bla ma dam
T02D2293:186a-27: pa'i gsung gi de nyid rin po che'i mthu las
T02D2293:186a-28: de dag la lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ston
T02D2293:186a-29: par byed dom // de bzhin dus ra ha'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:186a-30: sems kyi dbang po'i mda' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2293:186a-31: rkang pa gnyis pas don de nyid gsungs te /
T02D2293:186a-32: bskyod ces bya ba la sogs pa ni ri bong
T02D2293:186a-33: 'dzin pa byang chub kyi sems aa wa dh'u t'i'i
T02D2293:186a-34: lam gyis gang du yongs su skyod par byed pa
T02D2293:186a-35: de nyid bla ma'i drin gyis rdo rje'i rtse mo
T02D2293:186a-36: mchog la mya ngan 'das pa 'od gsal bar gyur
T02D2293:186a-37: pa'o // padma'i rol bde ba chen po'i ro de yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2293:186a-38: padma can ni de nyid rang bzhin yongs su dag
T02D2293:186a-39: pa aa wa dh'u t'i pa bdag med ma chu
T02D2293:186a-40: skyes kyi ro de nyid byang chub kyi sems bde
T02D2293:186b-0: ba chen po'i ros sku @186b rdo rje rgyas pa'i
T02D2293:186b-1: phyir bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor steng du 'bab
T02D2293:186b-2: pa'i phyir ro // de bzhin du nag po spyod pa'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:186b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2293:186b-5: rkang pa gsum pas don de nyid gsungs te /
T02D2293:186b-6: khyad par gyi dga' ba la sogs pa mtshan nyid
T02D2293:186b-7: dang bral ba bzhi pa'i dga' ba dag pa 'di
T02D2293:186b-8: khyad par gyi dga' ba gang gi rnal 'byor gyi
T02D2293:186b-9: dbang phyug gi rtogs pa bla ma'i drin gyis nyin
T02D2293:186b-10: mtshan du gyur pa de nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2293:186b-11: rje 'dzin pa mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan
T02D2293:186b-12: pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'o //
T02D2293:186b-13: 'dir de nyid rnams kyi ma rig pa'i skabs med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2293:186b-14: de bzhin du rdo rje da d'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:186b-15: ba lang khu rig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2293:186b-16: rkang pa bzhi pas rang gi rtogs pa brtan par byed do //
T02D2293:186b-17: bhu su kus smras zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2293:186b-18: ni bhu su ku'i zhabs kyis bdag gis bshad pa
T02D2293:186b-19: ste / thabs dang shes rab sbyor bas lhan cig
T02D2293:186b-20: skyes pa'i dga' ba bde ba chen po bla ma
T02D2293:186b-21: dam pa'i drin gyis khong du chud pas rol pa'o
T02D2293:186b-22: ste / // bar d'i zhes pa'i glu dbyangs sa ra ha'i zhabs kyi'o //
T02D2293:186b-23: mtho zhing mtho pa'i ri po der //
T02D2293:186b-24: sa wa ri yi bu mo 'dug / rma bya'i mdongs ni lus la gyon //
T02D2293:186b-25: ma du'i phreng ba mgul du dpyangs //
T02D2293:186b-27: gu li ma byed sa wa ri //
T02D2293:186b-28: khyod kyi rang gi khyim mi mo //
T02D2293:186b-29: ming ni lhan skyes mdzes ldan ma //
T02D2293:186b-30: sna tshogs shing mchog rtse mo ni //
T02D2293:186b-31: nam mkha'i mthil du yal ga reg / gcig pu ra sa wa ri nyid 'gro //
T02D2293:186b-33: khams gsum po yi khri nyid bshams //
T02D2293:186b-34: bde ba chen po'i nyal sa byas //
T02D2293:186b-35: sa wa ri sprul bdag med ma //
T02D2293:186b-36: gzugs 'tshong dga' bas nam langs gyur //
T02D2293:186b-37: sems ni so rtsi bde ba che //
T02D2293:186b-38: ga bur za ba stong pa yi //
T02D2293:186b-39: bdag med ma yis mgul nas 'khyud //
T02D2293:186b-40: bde chen mtshan mo nam langs gyur //
T02D2293:186b-41: bla ma'i gsung gi gzhu dang ni //
T02D2293:187a-1: yis phug / mda' gcig nyid ni bsdogs byas nas //
T02D2293:187a-2: mchog gi mya ngan 'das pa phug / smyon pa sha wa ri pa ni //
T02D2293:187a-3: cher khros ri bo mchog rtse yi //
T02D2293:187a-4: mtshams su zhugs nas sha wa ri //
T02D2293:187a-5: bdag gis ji ltar mchong bar byed //
T02D2293:187a-6: grub pa'i slob dpon sa wa ri pa'i zhabs kyis
T02D2293:187a-7: don de nyid snying rje chen po'i ros phug pas
T02D2293:187a-8: 'jig rten pa'i don du gsungs so //
T02D2293:187a-9: mtho zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnal 'byor
T02D2293:187a-10: gyi dbang phyug gi rang lus sgal tshigs kyi dbyig
T02D2293:187a-11: pa mtho ba'i ri rab kyi rtse mo la bde
T02D2293:187a-12: ba chen po'i 'khor lor sa yig gi pha rol
T02D2293:187a-13: ha yig de nyid 'dzin pa de nyid sa wa
T02D2293:187a-14: ri'o // de'i khyim ye shes kyi phyag rgya bdag
T02D2293:187a-15: med ma aa yig las skyes pa la 'dug par
T02D2293:187a-16: ri'o // byed do // rma bya'i mdongs zhes pa
T02D2293:187a-17: ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par
T02D2293:187a-18: rtog pa'i gzugs kyis lhag par gnas pa de la
T02D2293:187a-19: gos dang rgyan du byas pa'o //
T02D2293:187a-20: ma ru ni gunydza ste mgrin pa longs spyod kyi
T02D2293:187a-21: 'khor lo la gu hya'i gsang sngags lhag par rnam
T02D2293:187a-22: par 'dzin pa'o // rkang pa gzhan gyi rkang pas dh'u'i rkang par shes par bya'o //
T02D2293:187a-23: rkang pa gnyis pas goms pa'i rang bzhin gsungs so //
T02D2293:187a-24: smyon pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bcom
T02D2293:187a-25: ldan 'das bdag med ma'i ngo bos dbugs 'byin pa
T02D2293:187a-27: kye'i smyon pa yul la 'khrul pa'i sems sa wa ri thabs dang shes rab gcig pa'o //
T02D2293:187a-28: gu li zhes pa ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma byed cig pa'o //
T02D2293:187a-29: bdag nyid khyod kyi khyim mi mo ni ye shes
T02D2293:187a-30: kyi phyag rgya lhan cig skyes pa ni mdzes pa
T02D2293:187a-31: can no // sna tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de'i lus kyi ri rab bo //
T02D2293:187a-32: shing mchog gi ma rig pa'i gzugs la dga' ba
T02D2293:187a-33: la sogs pa'i sngags kyi sna tshogs pa'i rab tu
T02D2293:187a-34: byed pa'i rgyas pa rang gi gzugs su gyur pa'o
T02D2293:187a-35: // 'di'i yal ga yang phung po lnga nam mkha' la 'od gsal la reg pa'o //
T02D2293:187a-36: de'i phyir de bdag med ma gcig pu'o //
T02D2293:187a-37: rna rgyan zhes pa ni sna tshogs pa'i gnas la
T02D2293:187b-0: 'khor @187b lo la sogs pa'i phyag rgya lnga dus
T02D2293:187b-1: pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byas nas /
T02D2293:187b-2: rdo rje ni thabs kyi ye shes rnam par 'dzin
T02D2293:187b-3: pa zung 'jug gi tshul gyis 'dir lus kyi ri
T02D2293:187b-4: bo la 'gro ba ni rol bar byed pa'o //
T02D2293:187b-5: rkang pa gsum pas rol pa'i bde ba'i stobs gsungs te /
T02D2293:187b-6: khams gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khams gsum
T02D2293:187b-7: ni lus dang ngag dang yid rnams nam mkha' la
T02D2293:187b-8: 'od gsal ba brkyang nas de yis gzung ba'i bde
T02D2293:187b-9: ba chen por nyal bar byas nas sa wa ri
T02D2293:187b-10: sems kyi rdo rje ni ltos 'gro dang lhan cig
T02D2293:187b-11: gzugs 'tshong ma zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa
T02D2293:187b-12: 'joms pa'i phyir d'a ri ka ste /
T02D2293:187b-14: dga' bas zhes pa ni rol pa'i dpe med pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2293:187b-15: mtshan mo zhes pa ni mun par thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par rtog pa 'joms pa'o//
T02D2293:187b-16: de bzhin du sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis kyang /
T02D2293:187b-17: dpal gyi rdo rje bdud rtsi nyid kyang 'khor //
T02D2293:187b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2293:187b-19: rkang pa bzhi pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo gsungs te /
T02D2293:187b-20: rma bya'i mdongs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2293:187b-21: snying gi 'od gsal go lar mos pa dang ga
T02D2293:187b-22: bur ni zung du 'jug pa'i ngo bos rgyu dang
T02D2293:187b-23: 'bras bu nyid kyis de yis der mos pa'o //
T02D2293:187b-24: stong pa zhes pa ni de nyid rnam pa thams
T02D2293:187b-25: cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid do
T02D2293:187b-26: // bdag med ma'i ye shes rnal 'byor mas /
T02D2293:187b-27: mgul pa ni longs spyod kyi 'khor lor rnam par
T02D2293:187b-28: 'dzin pa bde ba chen po'i ye shes 'od zer
T02D2293:187b-29: gyis / nam zhes pa ni rang gi lus la nyon mongs pa'i mun pa rang nyams pa'o //
T02D2293:187b-30: de bzhin du yad s'u ta ke las kyang /
T02D2293:187b-31: rgyu dang 'bras bu rgyas gdab pa //
T02D2293:187b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so ;
T02D2293:187b-33: / rkang pa lnga pas rdo rje bla ma'i bdag nyid che ba gsungs te /
T02D2293:187b-34: bla ma'i gsung gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2293:187b-35: bla ma dam pa'i gsung gzhur byas nas rang gi
T02D2293:187b-36: yid byang chub kyi sems kyi mda'o //
T02D2293:187b-37: mda' gcig nyid ni bsdogs byas nas //
T02D2293:188a-1: po dag gcig tu byas nas dbyangs gcig nges par
T02D2293:188a-2: sgrogs pas de la goms par byas par gyur pa
T02D2293:188a-3: de yis mya ngan las 'das pas sa ra ha'i
T02D2293:188a-4: zhabs bdag gis thog ma med pa'i ma rig pa'i
T02D2293:188a-5: bag chags kyi skyon bcom pa'o //
T02D2293:188a-6: rkang pa drug pas sems kyi yang dag par ji lta ba'i ngo bo gsungs te /
T02D2293:188a-7: smyon pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lhan
T02D2293:188a-8: cig skyes pa'i chang gis rab tu myos pa dag
T02D2293:188a-9: gi sems rdo rje nyid sa wa ri'o //
T02D2293:188a-10: cher khros pa zhes pa ni ye shes kyi dga'
T02D2293:188a-11: ba'i dris bskul bar gyur pa bde ba chen po'i
T02D2293:188a-12: 'khor lor padma bzhin du gyen du rab tu bskyod

T02D2293:191b-10: de'i phyir bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid yis rnal

T02D2293:193a-10: blo gros dang ldan 'di yi mthu yis ni //

T02D2293:194b-30: nyid gsungs so // rang nyid med pas zhes bya
